レスタニア最奥、樹海に閉ざされた秘境
樹齢数百年にのぼる巨木が生い茂るこの森は
以前エルフ族が住み、その都を築いた場所である
森の名もまた、エルフ族の言語が元であると
言われている
column4:
In the deepest part Lestania, a hidden paradise
secluded in the forest.
This forest, over hundreds of years old, is
densely populated by towering ancient trees.
It used to be the home of the Elves, where they
built their capital city.
The name of the forest is also said to originate
from the language of the elves.

column3:
ディナンの森唯一の住民が暮らす遺跡
エルフの文化や戦闘術を学びたい者に
とっては特に重要な拠点となるだろう
column4:
The only inhabited site in the Deenan Forest.
An especially important base for those who want
to learn about Elven culture and the art of
warfare.

column3:
エルフの言葉で“森の淀み”を意味するこの場所
には、汚れた土や不純な精気が溜まりやすい
という。それらは時に形を持ち魔物化する
ため、見かけた場合は討伐し浄化したほうがよい
column4:
In the Elven language, this place means "the
stillness of the forest."
It is prone to accumulate unclean soil and impure
energy.
Occasionally, these can take shape and turn into
enemies, so it is advisable to defeat and cleanse
them when encountered.

column3:
エルフ族の大規模な住居跡
いくつもの広場や部屋で構成されており、相当数の
エルフがここで暮らしていたことを物語っている
遺跡内部には、特別な水を湛えた井戸が
あるという
column4:
The remains of a large dwelling of the Elven race.
Consists of multiple plazas and rooms, telling
the story of a significant number of Elves living
here. Inside the ruins, there is said to be a well
containing special water.

column3:
ディナン南部を意味する河岸一帯
銀色の毛を持つ凶暴な猿鬼が徘徊するように
なったようだ
その銀の猿鬼は、エルフ族が森でもっとも
出会いたくない魔物筆頭であったらしい
column4:
The riverbank area that signifies the southern
part of Deenan.
Seems to have become a place where a ferocious
monkey demon with silver fur wanders.
It seems that this silver monkey demon is the
foremost creature that the Elves did not want to
encounter in the forest.

column3:
ディナン低地には美しい霊水を湛えた泉がある
その生命力に魅かれ、度々肉体を持たぬ者が
彷徨い出ては命ある者に襲い掛るという
不自然に白い人影を見かけた場合、泉には
近寄らぬほうがいいだろう
column4:
There is a spring in the lowlands of Deenan that
holds beautiful sacred water.
Drawn to its vitality, beings without physical
forms often wander and attack those who have life.
If you happen to see a strangely white figure,
it's best to stay away from the spring.

column3:
エルフの都《エルテ・ディナン》一角にあるという
住居群の一つ。広大な区画らしいが、長らく閉ざ
されており、内部がどうなっているかは不明
出入り口が閉ざされたのには、なにか理由が
あるのかもしれない
column4:
One of a group of dwellings located within a
corner of the Erte Deenan, the elven capital.
It appears to be a vast area, but it has been
closed off for a long time, and the interior
remains unknown. There may be a reason for the
entrance to be sealed.

column3:
森の中でも有数の大樹がそびえ立つ広場
まるで大樹に守られているかのような静かな
空間だったが、突如この場で暴れはじめた
エントが確認され、状況は急変しつつある
column4:
In a clearing where one of the largest trees in
the forest stands tall, it was a peaceful space as
if protected by the great tree.
However, suddenly, an Ent, a rare sight in this
area, started rampaging, and the situation is
rapidly changing.

column3:
かつて森の民が使っていたディナン深層林と
ミスリウ森林を繋ぐ自然洞窟
長らく閉ざされていたため、内部が
どうなっているか知る者はいない
column4:
A natural cave that connects the deep forests of
Deenan and Mysree, which were once used by the
people of the forest.
It has been closed off for a long time, so no one
knows what it looks like inside.

column3:
ディナン深層林、南西にあるエルフ族の住居跡
聖なる泉、エルネア・スプリングに近い穏やかな
地のはずが、今や他と同じく野獣の住処に
なっている
column4:
The remains of the Elves dwelling in Deenan
Woods, located in the southwest.
What used to be a peaceful land near the sacred
Elnea Spring has now become a dwelling for wild
animals, just like everywhere else.

column3:
巨木に覆われ、緑の葉影が美しい遺跡
遺跡内に生えた巨木の中には、入る者
を拒みエント化したものもあるという
column4:
Covered by towering trees, the ruins are adorned
with the beautiful shade of green leaves.
It is said that some of the gigantic trees that
grow within the ruins have become Ents, refusing
entry to anyone who approaches them.

column3:
南部、水辺近くにあるエルフ族の住居跡
かつては水面に映る月が美しい場所であると
エルフ達の人気も高かったようだが、
今やその面影はない。水の運用に関しては
最も進んだ設備を備えていたらしい
column4:
Ruins of the Elves residence near the water's
edge in the southern region.
It used to be a beautiful place where the moon
reflected on the water was highly admired by the
Elves.
However, now there is no trace of that beauty.
It seems they had the most advanced facilities
for managing water.

column3:
エルフ族が築いた壮麗なる都
しかし、エルフ族が姿を消して以降美しさはその
ままに、ゆっくり時と共に森に呑まれつつある
彼らの神秘的で精緻な技は、今なおエルテ・ディナン
のいたるところに遺されている
column4:
A magnificent city built by the Elves.
Even after the disappearance of the Elves, the
beauty remains, gradually being swallowed by the
forest with the passing of time.
Their mystical and exquisite craftsmanship is
still left everywhere in Erte Deenan.

column3:
どこかにあるという、エルフ達が築いた
美しい地下水路
遺跡で見つかった書物に存在が記されていた
column4:
According to a book found in the ruins, there is
a beautiful underground waterway built by the
elves somewhere.

column3:
エルフの都《エルテ・ディナン》内にある
区画の一つ。蝶印のついた鍵で閉ざされて
いるため、立ち入るのであればまずは
鍵の入手が必要になる
column4:
Located within the Elven capital, "Erte Deenan,"
this is a section of the city.
In order to enter, one must first obtain a key
marked with a butterfly symbol.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
深いディナンの森で新たに発見された森民の遺跡
鳥の鳴き声や羽ばたきが四方から響いている
内部はかなり複雑な構造になっているらしく、元は
エルテ・ディナンに次ぐ規模の居住区だったようだ
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
A recently discovered forest dwelling of the
forest people in the depths of Deenan.
The sounds of birds chirping and wings flapping
echo from all directions.
The interior seems to have a quite complex
structure, and it appears that it was once a
residential area of considerable size, second only
to Erte Dinan.

column3:
多彩な獣が棲息し、アッカーシェランにおいて
国内有数の狩場となっている山麓
まっすぐに伸びる良質な木材にも恵まれており
近隣に棲む人々の多くは狩猟、もしくは林業で
生計を立てて暮らしている
column4:
Various animals inhabit the foothills and it has
become one of the top hunting grounds in the
country.
The foothills are also blessed with high-quality
timber that stretches straight.
Many of the nearby residents make a living
through hunting or forestry.

column3:
西部にはアッカーシェラン最大の湖《翡翠湖》が
広がっているのが最大の特徴。
その大きな湖からもたらされる恵みの一つが
大振りで上品な味の魚であり、地域の村や
集落には独自の魚料理が発達している
column4:
In the western region, the largest lake in Acre
Selund, known as "Emerald Lake," spreads out,
which is its main feature of area. One of the
blessings brought by this large lake is the large
and elegant-tasting fish, which has led to the
development of unique fish cuisine in the local
villages and settlements.

column3:
解放軍が拠点として使っている小さな集落
元はきこりが使っていたらしき空き家を中心に、
逃げ延びた人たちがテントを張って暮らしているが
いつオークに攻め込まれるかわからない状況にある
column4:
The small settlement used as a base by the
Liberation Army.
It originally consisted of vacant houses,
seemingly once occupied by lumberjacks.
Now, people who managed to escape have pitched
tents and are living there, constantly facing the
uncertainty of when they will be attacked by Orcs.

column3:
600年ほど前に建造された砦
アッカー家が並み居る地方豪族を倒して
大陸統一を果たした後に、対オーク用に強化されて
現在に至る。長く役目を果たしていたが“悪しき竜”
出現直後にオーク軍に占拠された
column4:
A fort that was built about 600 years ago.
After the Acre family defeated the local feudal
lords, they strengthened it to fend off the Orcs
and it has remained that way to this day.
It had served its purpose for a long time, but
was occupied by the Orc army shortly after the
appearance of the "Evil Dragon."

column3:
翡翠湖を臨む、長くロスギル家が治める地方の中心地
魔物が多い地帯ならではの重装家屋が見られる
王族アッカー家から一帯の守護を任されてきた
ロスギル家の末裔を長に頂き、忠誠心に篤い人々が
暮らしている
column4:
Overlooking Emerald Lake, in the heart of a
region long ruled by the Rothgill family.
One can see the sturdy houses characteristic of
this land abundant in enemies.
Tasked with protecting the entire area by the
noble Acre family, descendants of the Rothgill
family serve as its leaders, with loyal and
devoted individuals living here.

column3:
一部では“南の盗賊”と呼ばれる大盗賊ベルタ
率いる盗賊団の隠れ里。湖に流れ込む川に
よって浸食されてできた洞窟でもある
並の人間では辿り着くことができない場所に
あるといわれている
column4:
A hidden village of a notorious bandit group led
by the great bandit Bertha, also known as the
"Bandit of the South."
It is said to be located in a cave formed by
erosion from a river that flows into the lake, in
a place that cannot be reached by ordinary people.

column3:
隠れ村ピレモス付近にあるグリムゴブリンたちの
縄張り。見よう見まねで作ったらしき、オークや
人間の作るものに似た構造物が散見される
どうやらゴブリンたちもここを拠点とし
人間の動向を見張っているつもりのようだ
column4:
The territory of the Grim Goblins near Hidden
Village Piremoth.
Structures resembling those made by orcs and
humans can be seen, apparently made by mimicking.
It seems that the goblins consider this place
their base and are keeping an eye on the movements
of humans.

column3:
ロスギルにほど近い開けた高台
まだ拠点として使われている様子は
見られないが、魔狼たちがなわばりとして
警戒し続けていることから、ロスギルへ
攻め込む際の足掛かりとされる可能性がある
column4:
An open plateau, not far from Rothgill.
Although it doesn't appear to be currently used
as a base, there is a possibility that it serves
as a stepping stone for an attack on Rothgill, as
the demon wolves continue to guard it
territorially.

column3:
魔軍の襲撃により抵抗虚しく潰えた村
周囲の小さな集落を繋ぐ役割を果たしていた中心的な
山村だったが、それ故に早期に魔軍の襲撃を受けた
建物は一つ残らず破壊され、放たれた火が未だ燻り
続ける様には生々しい痛ましさが漂う
column4:
The village, which served as the central mountain
village connecting the surrounding small
settlements, was completely crushed by the raid of
the Demon Army.
Every building was destroyed without exception,
and the lingering fire still smolders, carrying a
raw and painful sensation.

column3:
解放軍が休憩をとるために設営した小さな小屋
オークたちの襲撃を受けた際に母屋以外は全て
破壊されてしまった。そればかりか、現在は
魔軍が利用している形跡すらみられる
column4:
The small hut set up by the Liberation Army for
rest was completely destroyed during the Orc
attack, except for the main house.
Not only that, but there are even signs that the
Demon Army is currently using it.

column3:
魔軍が休息地として利用している岩洞
入口からは想像がつかないほど大きく開けた内部
空間は一見休むに最適かと思えるが、じめじめと
しており、スライムなども発生しやすい。魔物ならば
いざ知らず人間はここで休む気にはなれないだろう
column4:
The demon army is using the cave as a resting
place.
The interior, which is much larger than one would
imagine from the entrance, seems like an ideal
place to rest at first glance. However, it is damp
and prone to slime and other creatures.
While demons may not mind, humans would not feel
inclined to rest here.

column3:
関所を守るように魔軍の大隊が留まっている拠点
設置された多数の大砲は解放軍の戦力を大幅に削いだ
運良く砲弾を逃れた兵もいたようだが、敵陣の
中で寡兵での戦いを強いられることとなったのは
寧ろ悲劇であった
column4:
The demon army's battalion is stationed at the
stronghold, as if guarding a checkpoint.
The numerous cannons that were set up
significantly depleted the liberation army's
forces.
Some fortunate soldiers managed to dodge the
cannonballs, but they were forced into a battle
with few troops within enemy lines.
It was a tragedy.

column3:
魔軍戦車《カトブレパス》が留められている広場
巨大且つ凶暴、全てを踏み砕きながら進む
カトブレパスだが、魔軍はそれをさらに武装させた
ものを“戦車”として使役している
column4:
The plaza where the demon army's tank,
Catoblepas, is stationed.
Gigantic and fierce, it crushes everything in its
path.
The demon army has further armed and prepared it
as a "tank" for their use.

column3:
他の拠点とは異なり、施設や柵の類が極端に少ない
魔軍拠点。何らかの理由で本来意図しなかった
場所に拠点を急造しなければならなかったのか、
あるいは柵を立てられない状況にあったのかは
偵察からの情報だけでは判断できない
column4:
Unlike other bases, this Demon Army stronghold
has extremely few facilities and fences.
It is unclear whether the base had to be hastily
constructed in an unintended location due to some
reason, or if they were unable to erect fences in
their current situation.
This cannot be determined based solely on
reconnaissance information.

column3:
オーク軍の将軍《獣の将》が支配する魔獣を
放している危険な区画が発見された
うろついている魔獣は獣の将が特に気に入って
いる個体であるとも、強化実験のために何らかの
特別な処理を施された個体だとも推測されている
column4:
A dangerous zone where the Beast Master of the
Orc army controls the beasts has been discovered.
It is speculated that the roaming demon beasts
are individuals that the Beast Master particularly
favors or individuals that have undergone some
special treatment for strengthening experiments.

column3:
一見よくある洞窟だが高低差が激しい
箇所があったり、より奥へ進んだ者がことごとく
戻らなかったという経緯から、近辺で育った
者はこの洞穴に近寄らないよう厳しく教え
込まれるという
column4:
At first glance, it appears to be a typical cave,
but there are steep variations in height, and
those who venture further inside never return.
People who grew up in the vicinity are strictly
instructed not to approach this cave.

column3:
廃村デニスィルの裏手にある古い地下水路
魔軍のオークが見張りについていることから
内部に何かが隠されているか、あるいは重要な
通路の一つとして見なされていると推測される
また、ティネス砦に繋がっているという説もある
column4:
Behind the deserted village of Denisyr, there is
an old underground waterway.
The fact that orc soldiers from the Demon Army
are stationed there suggests that something is
hidden inside or that it is considered an
important passage.
There is also a theory that it connects to Fort
Thines.

column3:
野生動物が棲みついている洞窟
特にめぼしい資源があるわけでもない場所
だったが、なぜか近年にわかに「奥に宝物が
隠されている」という噂が流れた
column4:
The cave where wild animals reside is not
particularly known for any valuable resources.
However, for some reason, a rumor has recently
spread saying that treasure is hidden deep within.

column3:
ダクレイム砦付近にある岩山の中に造られた遺跡
砦の付近という格好の場所にあるため、魔軍・人間
両勢力がこの遺跡を拠点として利用しようとしたが
共に最深部まで辿り着くことはできなかった
誰一人として生還者がいないため、その原因も不明
column4:
Ruins built inside a rocky mountain near Dacreim
Fortress.
It was a prime location, so both the Demon Army
and the humans tried to use this ruin as their
base.
However, neither of them were able to reach the
deepest part.
There were no survivors, and the cause is also
unknown.

column3:
ベルタ盗賊団のアジト近くに流れる地下水路
武装した魔獣が徘徊しているが、それを御す
オークの姿は確認されていない。盗賊団の
アジトを探すために放たれた魔獣が迷い込み、
そのまま帰還せず棲みついてしまったようだ
column4:
Near the hideout of Bertha's Bandit Group, there
is an underground waterway flowing.
Armed beasts roam around, but they are tamed.
No orcs have been spotted.
A magical creature that was unleashed to search
for the bandit group's hideout got lost and ended
up settling there.

column3:
アッカーシェラン王家に連なる者、または王家の
ためにその力を尽くした英雄たちが眠る祠
王家の治める地の中でもラスニテ山麓との
縁が深い英雄たちが祀られ、死した後も
人々を見守っているという
column4:
Shrine where the descendants of the Acre Selund
royal family, or the heroes who devoted their
power to the royal family, rest. Among the lands
ruled by the royal family, it is said that the
heroes who have a deep connection with the
Rathnite Foothills are enshrined and continue to
watch over the people even after their death.

column3:
本人が生前に希望、もしくは身寄りがないなど
特殊な事情を背負って散った戦士たちが葬られている
集団墓地。国が乱れる前までは専属の衛士によって
警備されていたが、現在は封鎖。内部がどのような状況
かもわからず、不気味な噂のみが広まっている
column4:
A collective graveyard where warriors who
perished under special circumstances, such as
having no kin, or expressing their desire for it
before their death, are buried.
Before the country fell into chaos, it was
guarded by dedicated soldiers, but now it is
sealed off.
The interior's condition is unknown, and only
eerie rumors have spread.

魔赤島・絶崖

最大標高を誇るボルド山を主とした山岳地帯
鉱石の名産地であり、古くから採掘師と武具職人
にとっては中心地だった。さらに、現在活動
は見られないもののボルド山は火山であり、温泉や
毒を含んだ液体なども多く噴出する
column4:
Mountainous region centered around Mount Volden,
which boasts the highest elevation.
It has been a renowned mining site and a central
location for miners and blacksmiths since ancient
times. Furthermore, although currently inactive,
Mount Volden is a volcano that often erupts hot
springs and various liquid substances, including
poisonous ones.

column3:
ボルド鉱山ふもとに広がる温泉町
湯あみ場《キノザ鉱泉》を中心に、古くから採掘者や
武具職人になじみの強い地として有名だった
近年鉱山に強力な魔物が出現したことで、
坑道の開発に支障をきたすようになった
column4:
A hot spring town at the foot of Volden Mines.
It is famous for its strong connection to miners
and weapon craftsmen from ancient times. In recent
years, powerful enemies have appeared in the
mines, causing disruptions to the development of
the tunnels. The heart of this town is the Kinoza
Mineral Springs, where people come to relax and
soak.

column3:
鉱山の町キノザを象徴する大温泉
労働者から富裕層まで男女問わず広く愛される
レスタニア随一の保養地である。３種ある浴室は
それぞれ内装や泉質が異なり、誰もが一度は
最高級の湯を夢見る
column4:
The great hot spring that symbolizes the mining
town of Kinoza, loved by both men and women, from
laborers to the wealthy.
It is the finest resort in Lestania.
There are three types of baths, each with
different interiors and spring qualities, and
everyone dreams of experiencing the highest
quality hot spring at least once.

column3:
自然洞窟を利用したゴブリン族のねぐら
《貪欲のギルスタン》を王とし、多くのゴブリンが
洞穴に出入りしている。王の蒐集癖のせいか
生き残りのためか、洞穴に住まうゴブリン達は
人間との対立を避けているようだ
column4:
Goblin tribe's lair, utilizing a natural cave.
With Gilstan, the King of Greed, leading, many
goblins come and go from the cave.
Perhaps due to the king's hoarding habit or for
the sake of survival, the goblins living in the
cave seem to avoid confrontation with humans.

column3:
ボルド鉱山とダウ渓谷の境には、南壁谷と
呼ばれる谷道があるが、その中ほどにあるのが
《南壁のひび》と呼ばれる洞窟である。採掘に
出向いた者がことごとく戻らなかったことから
キノザにより入り口は閉ざされた
column4:
Southern Wall Gorge, on the border between Volden
Mines and Dowe Valley.
In the middle of that gorge is a cave known as
the Southern Wall Fissure. Due to the fact that
everyone who went to mine there never returned,
the entrance was sealed by Kinoza.

column3:
レスタニア最大鉱山、中腹の坑道
最盛期には百人とも言われる鉱員が採掘に勤しん
でいたが、崩落と巨人の出現により閉山されて
いた。それでも良質鉱石の産地であることに
変わりなく、再開発を望む声は多い
column4:
Lestania's largest mine, the tunnel on the
mountainside.
During its heyday, it was said that about a
hundred miners worked diligently in the
excavation.
However, due to collapses and the appearance of
Giants, it was closed down.
Nevertheless, it remains a source of high-quality
ore, and there are many voices hoping for its
redevelopment.

column3:
ボルド小坑道へ続く山道。坑道に住む強力な
オーガ《坑道荒らし》の返り討ちに合い、派遣された
騎士団の骸が残されていることから、そう呼ばれて
いる。小坑道は採掘がまだ可能だが、現在は
近づく鉱員はほとんどいない
column4:
The mountain path continues towards the Volden
Narrow Tunnels.
It is called so because the remains of a knight
from the dispatched order were left behind after
being defeated by a powerful Ogre "Tunnel Thief"
who resides in the tunnel.
Although mining is still possible in the narrow
tunnels, there are hardly any miners approaching
them currently.

column3:
ボルドの野盗、ムジナ団がアジトにする廃坑道
長らく封鎖されていたものの、鍵が破壊された
らしく再び盗賊の活動が活発化してきた
身ぐるみ剥がされる覚悟がなければ
近づかない方がよいだろう
column4:
Volden's bandits, the Badger Gang, has made an
abandoned mine its hideout.
Although it had long been sealed off, the lock
has been broken.
It seems that the activities of the thieves have
once again intensified.
If you are not prepared to be stripped of
everything, it is best not to approach.

column3:
山頂の小堂が無人化して後、グリフィンが居付き
巣を作ってしまった。そこには、レスタニア各地から
巨鷲の「目に適ったモノ」が集められており、その
多くは人力では撤去できないが、主の不在を狙えば
思わぬ宝物が手に入る――かもしれない
column4:
After the summit chapel became unmanned, a
Griffin settled in and made its nest there.
The nest contains various items suitable to the
Griffin's eyes, collected from all over Lestania.
Many of these items cannot be removed by human
force, but if one were to take advantage of the
absence of the owner, they might unexpectedly
obtain a treasure.

column3:
《ボルド大坑道》の最奥、地層の硬さにより掘削が
見送られた洞穴部。数々の問題を解決して再開発を
行おうとした矢先、不気味な噂が流れて鉱員が
逃げ出し、再び開発の手が中断されることとなった
column4:
In the depths of the Volden Large Tunnels, mining
was halted due to the hardness of the earth
layers.
As they attempted to solve numerous problems and
proceed with redevelopment, eerie rumors spread
and the miners fled, causing the development to
once again come to a halt.

column3:
キノザ近くに存在する元治水路
今は治水路としての機能はなく、鉱毒が溜まる
危険な場所になっている
向かうなら、毒への備えが必要だろう
column4:
Former flood control channel near Kinoza is a
hazardous location.
It no longer functions as a drainage channel and
is now filled with toxic minerals.
If you plan to go there, you will need to be
prepared for the poison.

column3:
ボルド大坑道と同時期に開発された坑道
ここも以前は鉱員の出入りが多かったが
人喰い鬼が出現するようになり寂れてしまった
たびたび騎士団が派遣されているが
いまだ退治完了の報告はない
column4:
This tunnel was developed around the same time as
the Volden Large Tunnels.
In the past, there used to be many miners coming
and going, but it has become desolate since
man-eating demons started appearing.
The knight order has been frequently dispatched,
but there is still no report of completion of
their task.

column3:
周辺を荒らす悪鬼たちが群れる岩窟
ホボリックの小鬼達と対立するゴブリン集団
のほか、凶悪な人喰い鬼もこの洞窟をねぐら
にしている
column4:
The evil demons that rampage in the surrounding
areas flock to the cavern.
In addition, there is a goblin group that opposes
the Hobolic goblins.
Furthermore, brutal man-eating demons also make
this cave their lair.

column3:
ボルド大坑道で採掘が盛んだった頃
鉱員がダウ渓谷との連絡用に使っていた坑道
使われなくなって久しいものの、南壁谷の
道がなんらかの事情で塞がった場合は
唯一の交通路となる
column4:
During the time when mining was thriving in the
Volden Large Tunnels, miners used this tunnel as a
means of communication with Dowe Valley.
Although it has been unused for a long time, it
serves as the only passage if the Southern Wall
Gorge road becomes blocked due to any
circumstances.

column3:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
ボルド鉱山の頂き近くにあり、キノザからもその
姿を見ることができる。まだ参拝者もいるが
巨鳥が近くに巣くってしまい、悩みの種と
なっている
column4:
In the past, there was a white dragon altar that
was celebrated in various places.
One of them is located near the peak of Volden
Mines, and its presence can also be seen from
Kinoza.
There are still visitors, but a giant bird has
built its nest nearby, causing troubles and
becoming a source of worry.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
《ボルド大坑道》の内部で発見された旧坑道
地熱の影響で坑内の気温が非常に高くなることが
あり、鉱員により早期に封鎖されていた
内部で希少な鉱石が採れるのではと推測されている
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
Inside the "Volden Large Tunnels," an old tunnel
was discovered.
Due to the influence of geothermal energy, the
temperature inside the tunnel becomes extremely
high,
and it was sealed off by miners early on.
It is speculated that rare minerals can be mined
inside.

column3: モロー樹林
モルフォール

森精の隠れ家

レスタニア中部に広がる大平原
白竜が墜ちた地として神殿が築かれ、人々が集った
ことから、全ての民にとって寄り所と言える地域に
なった。そのため、比較的魔物の勢力は弱いが
オークなど強力な魔物の侵入は脅威となる
column4:
A large plain spread across central Lestania.
A temple was built where the White Dragon fell,
and it
became an area that can be said to be a stronghold
for all people. Therefore, although nearby
monsters
are relatively weak, the intrusion of more
powerful
demons such as Orcs pose a threat.

column3:
白竜が座すレスタニアの中心地
覚者と白騎団の本拠地であるだけでなく、神殿周囲
には商店区、宿場区、港が築かれ都市となった
３００年に渡り、人々はこの地で竜に寄り添い
暮らしを営んでいる
column4:
Not only the home of the Arisen, the White Dragon
sits at the center of Lestania. With a temple
built
around them, over 300 years a bustling city grew,
with a relay station, harbor and shopping
district.

column3:
ハイデル平原南部に位置する村
ワインなど果実酒造りが盛んだったが、近年は不作
と原因不明の病により活力が落ちつつある
この異変には、廃屋化したハイデル教会が何らか
の形で関わるのではと噂されている
column4:
A village located in the southern part of Hidell
Plains.
Wine-making, such as fruit wines was a thriving
trade,
but in recent years, trade and health have
declined
from bad crop harvests and a mysterious disease.
After rumors about the nearby Hidell Chapel's
involvement surfaced, the chapel has since been
abandoned.

column3:
ハイデル平原とミスリウ森林を繋ぐ橋は以前の
水害で損壊したが、テルで資材手配が可能
となり、ようやく修復された
これでポーン郷、リンウッド方面との往来は
回復するだろう
column4:
The bridge that formerly had connected the Hidell
Plains and Mysree Forest was destroyed by flood
damage, but resources can be arranged at Tel
Village
to repair the broken bridge. With this, the
traffic to
and from Lynwood will be restored.

column3:
ハイデル南部、テル村に近い石造りの橋
ダウ渓谷方面との往来が盛んだった頃、この橋を通る
行商人が多かったことから、その襲撃に味を
しめたゴブリンにより度々占拠されるようになった
退治する者と小鬼のイタチごっこは現在も続いている
column4:
A stone bridge near Tel Village in Southern
Hidell.
When traffic to and from Dowe Valley was thriving,
there were many peddlers passing through this
bridge, which led goblins to occasionally occupy
it.
Those who exterminate the small demons on the
bridge may still continue to do so.

column3:
テルの東にあるハイデル教会地下墓地
以前は祈りの場として訪れる者も多かったが
廃屋化して後、扉が開かれたことはない
夜間徘徊する亡者の目撃談もあり、今では誰も
教会に近づかなくなっている
column4:
Hidell Chapel catacombs located to the east of Tel
village. Previously visited by many as a place of
prayer, the doors to the catacombs have not been
opened since the chapel's abandonment.
Eyewitnesses report sighting the deceased
wandering
the grounds at night; nobody has approached chapel
since.

column3:
テル村、廃墟の地下倉庫に存在する目的不明の
地下道。民家の地下室にこのような場所がある
ことを巡り、その昔ある事件があったらしいが
語る者はおらず、忘れられようとしている
column4:
An underground warehouse of unknown purpose near
Tel village, which exists in the ruins.
There is a place like this in the basement of
many a house, but there seems to have been an
incident in the past, and there is no one to speak
of it, as it is trying to be forgotten.

column3:
平原中央付近の河原。グリッテン砦以北の川上から
さまざまな物――戦場の残がいや遺体――が流れ
つくことから、その名で呼ばれるようになった
血の臭いに魅かれたリザードマンが棲みつくように
なり、現在は危険地域に指定されている
column4:
The riverbank near the central plains.
It came to be called that because various things,
such as remnants of battlefields and corpses,
flowed down from the upstream of the river north
of Gritten Fort.
Saurians, who were drawn to the smell of blood,
settled there and it is now designated as a
dangerous area.

column3:
ハイデル街道全域を脅かす野盗《黒狼団》のアジト
強力な首領が束ねており、騎士団や覚者と度々
衝突してきた。結果、アジトは戦陣のように物物しく
なっている。街道を通る際は彼らへの警戒を
忘れてはならない
column4:
The hideout of the bandit group "Black Wolf Gang"
threatens the entire Heidell Highway.
They are led by a powerful leader and have
frequently clashed with the Knight Order and the
Arisen.
As a result, their hideout has become like a
battlefield.
When passing through the highway, one must not
forget to be cautious of them.

column3:
ハイデル地下霊廟には、疫病で死んだ者や罪人
のみを埋葬する下層階が存在する
より強い瘴気が溜まっており、特別な用でも
ない限り足を踏み入れるべき場所ではない
column4:
In the Hidell Catacombs, there is a lower level
where only those who died from disease or
criminals are buried.
It accumulates a stronger miasma, so it is not a
place to step into unless there is a special
reason.

column3:
ハイデル地下霊廟には秘密の最下層があり
邪教の礼拝堂があるとも噂されていた
その噂は過去にテルで起こった事件から
発したものであるらしいが、真相は不明
column4:
In the Hidell Catacombs, there is said to be a
secret lowest level; It is rumored to be a cult's
chapel.
The origin of this rumor seems to stem from an
incident that occurred in Tel in the past, but the
truth remains unknown.

column3:
テルの西、《アーク》に近い通路
元は特筆すべきこともないただの通路だったが
付近を通りかかった人々から、ここで耳慣れぬ
金属が擦れるような音を聞いたという噂が
流れ始めたため、調査の対象となった
column4:
In the western part of Tel, near the Ark, there
was a hallway.
It was originally just a regular hallway with
nothing particularly notable about it. However,
rumors started circulating among the people who
passed by that they heard unfamiliar sounds, like
the scraping of metal, coming from this hallway.
Because of this, it became the subject of
investigation.

column3:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
動乱のおりに一度は廃墟化したものの
現在は見習い騎士や新人覚者の修行場として
新たな役割を担っている
column4:
In the olden days, one of the altars of the White
Dragon, worshiped in various places, was once in
ruins during the upheavals.
However, it is now fulfilling a new role as a
training ground for apprentice knights and novice
Arisen.

column3:
テル村の外れにある廃屋の地下室
度々周囲で魔物が目撃され、夜は不気味な
物音が響くこともしばしば
今では近寄る者はほとんどいない
column4:
The basement of an abandoned house on the
outskirts of Tel Village.
Frequently, monsters are sighted in the area, and
at night, eerie sounds are often heard.
Nowadays, hardly anyone approaches it.

column3:
ハイデル平原とミスリウ森林を繋ぐ自然洞窟
以前は狩人により頻繁に使われていたが
テルの南に橋が建造されてからは安全面の
問題から立ち入り禁止になっていた
column4:
The natural cave that connects the Hidell Plains
and Mysree Forest was previously frequently used
by hunters.
However, since a bridge was built to the south of
Tel, it has been prohibited to enter due to safety
concerns.

column3:
テル村の裏手にある枯れ井戸
使われなくなって久しいが、たまに妙な物音
や悪臭が中から漂ってくることがある
column4:
A dried up well behind Tel village. It has been
unusable for a long time, but occasionally strange
sounds and bad odors may drift out from inside.

column3:
ハイデル街道の傍にある枯れ井戸
リザードマンや、時にはさらに恐ろしい魔物が
潜伏していることもある
まだ見習いの覚者や騎士は、下手に内部を
探査しないほうがよい
column4:
Next to the Heidell Road there is a dried-up
well.
Sometimes, Saurians or even more terrifying
enemies lurk around.
Apprentice Arisen and Knights are advised not to
venture into its depths without caution.

column3:
ハイデル平原、グリッテン砦に近い川沿いの
小墓地。古い時代から存在しており、それほど
広くないものの現在は彷徨う死者の目撃例が
絶えず、近寄る者はいない
column4:
A small cemetery along the river near Fort
Gritten in Hidell Plains.
It has existed since ancient times and, although
not very large, there are constant sightings of
wandering souls.
No one dares to approach.

column3:
ハイデル平原、倒壊した家の地下室
周囲に猿獣が群れていることが多いため
内部にも入り込んでいる可能性が高い
column4:
The basement of a collapsed house in the Hidell
Plains. Brute apes are often seen flocking around
the
cellar, so it is highly probable they are also
inside.

column3:
天空より飛来した異様な石の塊《大石塊》
圧倒的な存在感は他に比類するものがなく、この
物体が現在レスタニアに存在するあらゆる技術
魔術の域を大きく凌駕していることは間違いない
column4:
A massive boulder-like object that descended from
the sky, with an incomparable overwhelming
presence.
There is no doubt that this object surpasses all
existing technology and magic in Lestania.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
テルの西に落下したアークの裏側から続く別階層
表側とは異なり、こちらには恐るべき危険性を
秘めた大型の錬魔も確認されたという。後に神殿を
攻める足がかりとして準備されていた可能性がある
column4:
<COL ffdc78>A door requiring a "Jewelry" key.
</COL>
Another layer that continues from the back of
the ark that fell west of Tel.
This passage is far more dangerous than the
front. A strange odor is present here as well.
It's possible that this location was prepared as
a foothold in case of attack.

column3: 支援品ランクアップ

レスタニア西部の海岸地帯
白い砂浜が続く景色は美しいが、時には思いも
よらぬものが浜辺に流れ着くことも。温暖で湿った
気候から、乾燥しがちのハイデル平原とは植生や
生息する魔物も異なる
column4:
A coastal zone in western Lestania.
The view of the white sandy beach is beautiful.
With its dry climate, the fauna and flora living
in the Hidell Plains is different.

column3:
ブリア海岸地域の漁村
比較的おだやかな環境に恵まれ、海が近く人々も
おおらか。しかし、海が村にもたらすものは魚や貝
だけではない。座礁船や、時には海竜といった脅威
が姿を現すこともある
column4:
Breya Coast region's fishing village.
It is blessed with a relatively calm environment
and a close proximity to the sea, making the
people easy-going.
However, what the sea brings to the village is
not just fish and shellfish.
There are also threats such as stranded ships and
sometimes even sea dragons that appear.

column3:
ブリア海岸の岬に立つ古い灯台
洋撃船や漁船の標として、レスタニアの海を
照らし続けてきた。灯台守は代々、退役騎士が
務める習わしとなっており、現在の守番は高名な
《シールドセージ》、ルドルフォである
column4:
The old lighthouse on the cape of Breya Coast.
Shining over the sea of Lestania as a beacon for
foreign ships and fishing boats. It is a tradition
for retired knights to serve as lighthouse
keepers, and the current guardian is the renowned
Shield Sage, Rudolfo.

column3:
ローテスに近い岸壁裏の小さな浜
人目に付きにくく、村や街道にも近いため、ならず者
が野宿をしたり盗品の一時保管に使う事も多い
覚者がローテスに立ち寄った際は、浜に異変がないか
確認しておいたほうがいい
column4:
A small beach behind the quay near Rotes.
It is hidden from view and close to the village
and the road, so it is often used by rogues to
camp out and temporarily store stolen goods.
When Arisen stop by Rotes, they should check the
beach to see if there is anything unusual.

column3:
ブリア海岸、岬に近い断崖地帯の大岩群
多数のハーピーが棲息しており、彼女らの巣が
密集していることから、村人達からその名で呼ばれて
いる。灯台に用がある時以外、鳥寄せ岩の付近を
通らぬよう村人は子供の頃から教えられている
column4:
A large group of rocks in the cliff area near the
cape ofThe Breya Coast.
It is inhabited by numerous Harpies, and their
nests are densely clustered there.
Because of this, the villagers have given it the
name "Birdcall Rock".
The villagers have been taught since childhood
not to pass near Birdcall Rock unless they have
business at the lighthouse.

column3:
海辺にある朽ちた廃屋の地下倉庫
魔物やならず者の溜まり場になりやすい
ことから封鎖されたが、何者かが侵入
したらしい形跡や物音が最近しばしば
確認されている
column4:
Abandoned underground storehouse within a
decaying shack by the seaside.
It tends to become a gathering place for monsters
and rogues, which is why it was sealed off.
However, recently there have been frequent
sightings of signs of someone or something
trespassing and strange noises.

column3:
南の海岸へ続く谷道にある、小鬼のキャンプ地
残虐で体格の大きなホブゴブリンの目撃があり
村人にとって不安の種となっている
また、このキャンプを境に南側は強力な魔物が
多いため、むやみに近づかない方がいい
column4:
There have been sightings of brutal and
physically imposing Hobgoblins in the valley path
that leads to the southern coast, where the little
goblins have set up their camp.
This has become a cause of concern for the
villagers.
Additionally, on the southern side of this camp,
there are powerful enemies, so it is advisable not
to approach casually.

column3:
数十年以上昔に魔物に襲われ、廃村と化した集落
白竜の力が弱まって後、恐ろしい魔物の襲撃にあい
抵抗の術もないまま一夜にして滅んだらしいが、
現在は当時の本当の経緯を知る者はいない
column4:
Decades ago, the village was attacked by monsters
and turned into an abandoned village.
After the power of the White Dragon weakened, the
village suffered a terrifying monster raid.
It was said that the village was destroyed
overnight without any means of resistance.
Currently, there is no one who knows the true
circumstances of that time.

column3:
ブリア海岸、南部に広がる浜辺
かつてはここも漁民にとって生活の場であったが
今や完全に魔物が徘徊する危険地帯となっている
特に近頃は大型の魔物が居付いてしまったようだ
column4:
A beach that stretches out in the southern part
of Breya Coast.
Once, this place was also a living place for
fishermen, but now it has become a dangerous area
where monsters roam freely.
Especially recently, it seems that large monsters
have settled here.

column3:
ブリア海岸のはずれ、断崖の中腹に入り口を
もつ自然洞窟。絶えず水音が聞こえることから
潮騒洞窟と呼ばれ、奥の滝は霊験あらたかとの
噂だが、ある事件をきっかけに封鎖されていた
column4:
Natural Cave on the edge of Breya coast.
Along a cliff's midsection, lies an entrance to a
natural cave. It is known as the Roaring Tide Cave
due to the constant sound of water. There are
rumors that the waterfall deep inside possesses
supernatural power. However, following an
incident, it has been sealed off.

column3:
《灯台下の古井戸》を覗き込んだ者が何か煌めく
ものを見たという噂が流れたが、古井戸の中には
投げ捨てられた廃棄物や動物の死骸などもどこかに
溜まっているであろうことから、内部に入ってまで
噂の元を探ろうとする者はいないようだ
column4:
Rumors have circulated that someone who peered
into the "Lighthouse Old Well" saw something
sparkling.
However, since it is likely that waste and animal
carcasses have accumulated somewhere inside the
well, no one seems willing to enter and
investigate the source of the rumors.

column3:
モルトバ灯台の傍にある古井戸
水が引いて後はリザードマンなどの魔物が
出入りするようになった
機能しているかは不明だが、魔物の侵入を
防ぐための古い装置が残っている
column4:
Next to the Moltova Lighthouse, there is an old
well.
After the water dried up, it became a place where
creatures like Saurians would come and go.
It is unclear if it still functions, but there
are still old devices that remain to prevent the
invasion of enemies like Saurians.

column3:
青爪浜にある廃村ルフローの地下室
ブリア海岸の奥は強力な魔物が多いため
とっさに逃げ場のない地下室の探索時は
準備をしておく方がいいだろう
column4:
It would be wise to prepare before exploring the
underground chamber of the deserted village of
Ruflow in Blue Claw Beach, as the depths of Breya
Coast are home to many powerful enemies.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
ブリア海岸傍の灯台下の井戸の中に入口が発見された
忘れられた古代の水路遺跡。長く閉鎖され未踏の地
であったため、独自の生態系を保持した環境と
なっているようだ
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
An entrance has been discovered within a well
beneath the lighthouse near the Breya Coast. It is
a forgotten ancient aqueduct relic that has long
been closed off and unexplored. It appears to have
maintained its own unique ecosystem.

column3: ラスニテ納骨廟

突如レスタニアの沖合に出現したフィンダム
大陸の一部。レスタニアに出現した侵食魔も
ここから飛来しており、この絶海の孤島が
“侵食”という脅威に対抗するための手がかりを
秘めていると予測される
column4:
Phindym suddenly appeared off the coast of
Lestania.
The invading corrupted creatures from the
continent fly in from here.
It is predicted that this isolated island in the
vast sea holds clues to opposing the threat of
"corruption."

column3:
魔赤島の北西部、最も高い断崖に近い一帯
何層にも崖が重なったような複雑な地形を
しており、滑落には特に注意が必要
column4:
A complex terrain resembling layers of
overlapping cliffs found in the northwestern part
of Bloodbane Isle.
Special attention must be paid to the risk of
falling.

column3:
魔赤島の北東部、一際標高が高い一帯
空に渦巻く何らかのエネルギー体に
最も近く、赤く照らされている
column4:
In the northeastern part of Bloodbane Isle, there
is an especially high elevation area,
where some kind of energy body swirls in the sky
close to it and illuminating it in red.

column3:
魔赤島における調査のために自然洞窟を
整備して駐屯地とした
侵食が進む魔赤島において、状態が良く
広さも申し分ない洞窟を発見できたことは
調査隊にとってまさに奇跡的な幸運であった
column4:
A natural cave developed and turned into a base
camp for the investigation of Bloodbane Isle.
In the rapidly deteriorating island plagued by
Corruption, it was truly a miraculous stroke of
luck for the research team to discover a cave that
was not only in good condition but also spacious
enough to meet their needs.

column3:
《群像の岩屋》近くの広場
高所から流れ落ちる雄大な滝を見ることが
できる。ただし、日光を避ける傾向にある
はずの侵食魔や菌胞がその勢力を日向にまで
拡げている、侵食の勢いが強い場所でもある
column4:
Nearby the Picturesque Grotto, there is a plaza
where you can witness the majestic waterfall
cascading down from a high place. However, the
corruption and infected fungi, which are supposed
to avoid direct sunlight, have extended their
influence even to the sunny areas. It is a place
where the force of corruption is strong.

column3:
肉食の魔物が獲物を貯蓄しているらしく
おびただしい数の死肉が散乱している
死肉の臭いが新たなる魔物を呼ぶため
それを漁る魔物は増加の一路を辿って
いるようだ
column4:
It appears that the carnivorous monsters are
storing their prey.
An enormous amount of dead flesh is scattered
around.
The smell of the dead flesh is attracting new
monsters, and the monsters that are scavenging for
it seem to be increasing.

column3:
《聖遺の塔》付近にある広場
海から吹き込む風が周囲を囲む崖面に
当たることで複雑な気流を生み出している
気流に誘い込まれてか、風を好んでか
有翼の魔物の姿がよく確認される
column4:
Plaza near the Sage Tower Ruins
The wind blowing in from the sea creates complex
air currents as it hits the surrounding cliffs.
Winged Beasts are often seen in this area,
seemingly drawn by these air currents or perhaps
attracted to the wind.

column3:
魔赤島中心部に位置する侵食の進んだ洞窟
洞窟入口周辺には溢れ出したかのように大量の
菌胞がはびこっている。内部の侵食がかなり
進んでいることは確実であり、慎重を期した
調査が望まれる
column4:
Located in the central part of Bloodbane Isle,
the cave is heavily corrupted.
In the vicinity of the cave entrance, there is an
overwhelming amount of fungal spores spreading.
The internal infection is considerable, and a
cautious investigation is desired.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
南部の海岸沿いの小道の先に発見された地下通路
内部の気温は地上と比べて数度低めである
単なる通路ではなく、遺跡のような造りになっており
崩れた人工物からは文化の一端が垣間見える
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
An underground passage was discovered at the end
of a small path along the southern coast.
The temperature inside is a few degrees lower
compared to the surface.
It is not just a simple passage but is
constructed like a ruin, and glimpses of a culture
can be seen from the collapsed artifacts.

column3:
魔赤島東部の海岸沿いに発見された洞窟
入口付近を調査した斥候隊により、微動だにしない
多数の人影を見たという報告が寄せられている
恐らく何らかの魔物による犠牲者の姿かと思われる
ため、軽率に足を踏み入れることは禁じられている
column4:
Cave discovered along the coast in the eastern
part of Bloodbane Isle
Reports have been received from the scouting
party who investigated the entrance area, saying
that they saw numerous figures that didn't move
even a bit.
It is likely that these are the victims of some
kind of enemy.
Therefore, it is forbidden to step inside without
caution.

column3:
魔赤島南部にある洞窟
斥候隊により、侵食ゴアサイクロプスがここを
ねぐらとしていることが判明している
残飯を狙ってか別種の魔物も多数棲みついているため
一定以上の戦力を持つ者のみが調査を許される
column4:
Located in the southern part of Bloodbane Isle,
there is a cave that has been discovered by the
scouts.
It has been confirmed that the Infected
Gorecyclops have made this place their lair.
Due to the presence of various other creatures,
possibly attracted by the leftovers, only those
with a certain level of strength are allowed to
conduct investigations.

column3:
魔赤島の自然洞窟
地盤が一部落ち窪んだようになっており
天井部分から青空が見える箇所もある
陽光が差し込む様は幻想的で美しい光景だが
内部は侵食魔が跋扈し、多数の菌胞も確認されている
column4:
The natural caves of Bloodbane Isle have
partially sunken and concave terrain, with some
areas where the ceiling reveals the blue sky.
The sunlight shining through creates a
fantastical and beautiful scene, but the interior
is infested with corruption, with numerous fungal
spores confirmed as well.

column3:
魔赤島中央部の海岸を辿った先に入口が発見された
地下施設。内部では水のせせらぎが絶えず響き
神聖さを感じさせる造りになっていることから
聖堂であると判断された。彫刻などの人工物が多数
残されており、異郷の文化を感じることができる
column4:
An entrance was discovered at the coast in the
central part of Bloodbane Isle.
Inside the underground facility, the sound of
flowing water constantly echoes, giving a sense of
holiness.
It was determined to be a sanctuary due to its
construction.
Many artificial objects, such as sculptures, have
been left behind, allowing one to experience a
foreign culture.

column3:
魔赤島に唯一存在する塔《聖遺の塔》の傍にある
枯れ井戸。長らく人の手が入らなかったようで
井戸蓋が錆び付いており、中々内部の様子を
探ることができなかった
column4:
Next to the Tower of the Holy Relics, the only
tower that exists on Bloodbane Isle, there is a
dried-up well. It seems that no one has touched it
for a long time, as the well cover is rusted and
it is difficult to examine the interior.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
《侵食魔の巣窟》のさらに奥に存在する空間
侵食魔は日光を避ける傾向にあることが判明
しているため、光の届かない内部にはさらに
侵食の進んだ魔物が潜んでいる可能性がある
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
A space that exists further inside the Infected
Den.
It has been determined that the Infected
creatures tend to avoid sunlight.
Therefore, there is a possibility that further
inside the area where light does not reach, there
are more infected enemies lurking.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
魔赤島の絶崖側と山頂側を繋ぐ橋の付近にある坑道
橋から見える滝の裏側に、ひっそりと隠れるように
存在していたため、発見と初期調査が遅れた
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
There is a tunnel near the bridge that connects
the cliff side and the summit side of Bloodbane
Isle.
It was hidden quietly on the back of the
waterfall visible from the bridge, which caused
the discovery and initial investigation to be
delayed.

column3:
《異邦の岬》の一部から崖下に降りた先に発見
された洞窟。内部からは激しい水音が響き
通常の洞窟と比べてはるかに大量の水を湛えた
洞窟であることが確認されている
column4:
Discovered at the bottom of the cliff after
descending from a part of the "Foreign Cape," a
cave where intense water sounds resonate inside
has been confirmed to hold a significantly larger
amount of water compared to a typical cave.

column3:
魔赤島・絶崖側の西端に見つかった洞窟
入口付近にも大きく成長した菌胞が張り付き
内部の侵食が激しく進んでいることが一目見て
わかるほどになっている。危機に対処可能な
実力を持つと認められた者のみが調査を許される
column4:
Cave found on the western edge of Bloodbane Isle
Precipice, known for its intense corruption and
infected fungal growth covering the entrance. Only
those recognized as having the ability to handle
the crisis are permitted to investigate it.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
魔赤島・絶崖側に発見された小聖堂
入口の扉は開閉されるごとに施錠される仕組みと
なっており、特殊な鍵を用いることでしか
開くことができない
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Dragon Force】Door</COL>
A small chapel discovered on the Bloodbane Isle -
Cliffside.
The entrance door is equipped with a locking
mechanism that locks every time it is opened and
closed, and can only be opened by using a special
key.

column3:
魔赤島中央部にそびえる海を臨む小塔
外壁の様子から、かなり古くも丁寧に手入れをされ
てきたことがうかがえる。用途は不明だが、すぐ傍に
井戸があることから塔内部あるいはその地下にも水が
流れている可能性がある
column4:
A small tower overlooks the sea towering in the
central part of Bloodbane Isle.
From the appearance of the outer wall, it can be
inferred that it has been quite old but carefully
maintained.
The purpose is unknown, but there is a well
nearby, suggesting that there may be water inside
the tower or underground.

レスタニア最北の《禁じられた地》
かつて黄金都市と謳われたメルゴダは大地ごと
消失しており、深く抉れた大穴だけがその痕跡を
示している。錬金技術で造られた歪な半生物は
大地に残され、今なお徘徊し続けているという
column4:
North of Lestania lies the Forbidden Land, known
as Mergoda, which was once hailed as the Golden
City.
However, it has completely disappeared, leaving
only a deep, gouged hole as its trace.
Twisted, semi-living creatures created through
alchemy remain on the land, still wandering to
this day.

column3:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
古いポーン、ダイオンが百年以上に渡り
護り続けている祠。ザンドラ禁域を訪れる
覚者への任務と警鐘を伝えるための場でもある
column4:
One of the altars of the White Dragon, which was
worshipped in various regions in ancient times.
The old Pawn, Dian, has been protecting this
shrine for over a hundred years.
It is also a place to convey missions and
warnings to the Arisen who visit the Zandora
Wastelands.

column3:
古い時代の謎に魅せられ、世俗を捨てた隠者が
一人で住む家。隠者はたびたび依頼の品や
問題について、祠に依頼を寄せているようだ
column4:
A hermit who was captivated by the mysteries of
ancient times, and who abandoned the secular
world, lives alone in a house. The hermit often
sends requests to the shrine for items or issues
that need attention.

column3:
二つのアーチ状の岩壁に囲まれた谷。そこを
メルゴダを守り続ける錬魔兵団が巡回している
今や、その巡視命令を解ける者はいないため
亡都へ向かうには彼らとの交戦もやむないだろう
まれに、恐るべき女守官が帯同することも
column4:
A valley enclosed by two arched rock walls. The
Mergoda Patrol Corps, dedicated to guarding
Mergoda, conducts regular patrols there. At
present, there is no one capable of revoking their
patrol orders, so it may be inevitable to engage
in combat with them in order to proceed towards
the capital. Occasionally, a formidable female
commander accompanies them.

column3:
ザンドラの蛮族が縄張りとする彼らの関所、通称
バンデッドホーントで、鉄の巨人が目撃された
彼らが発掘したものなのか、亡都からやって来た
ものかは不明。秘術の流出やバートランドの
新たな脅威となる前に破壊する必要がある
column4:
Their checkpoint, known as the Banded Haunt, is
the territory of Zandora's barbarians. A giant
made of iron was seen there. It is unclear whether
they discovered it or if it came from the fallen
capital. It is necessary to destroy it before it
becomes a new threat of leaked secret arts or
Betland.

column3:
禁域南東部の遺跡群には、文化を失い蛮行を
働き生き続けてきた集団が居付いている。彼ら
《ザンドラ・バルバロイ》に交渉や説得は不可能
なため、遭遇時は流血沙汰を覚悟しなければ
ならないだろう
column4:
In the ruins in the southeastern forbidden area,
there is a group called the Zandora Barbarians who
have lost their culture and continue to engage in
savage acts. Negotiation and persuasion with them
are impossible, so one must be prepared for
bloodshed if encountered.

column3:
セラー湖北岸の浜辺付近で、オークの残党が
野営を行っているのが確認された
どうやら、ガルドノックを離れた大将級の一派
らしい。新勢力となる前に有力な残党は叩いて
おきたい所だ
column4:
Near the beach on the northern shore of Lake
Cera, it has been confirmed that remnants of orcs
are camping. It appears to be a faction of
high-ranking commanders who have left Gardnox. We
should strike down the influential remnants before
they become a new force.

column3:
湿った黒土の谷間に、一頭のナイトメアが飛来した
かつてメルゴダの民が《嘆きのモーラ》と呼び
白竜自らが撃退せしめた恐るべき魔鳥である
放置すれば、レスタニア全土の危機となる
可能性がある
column4:
In the moist crevice of black soil, a Nightmare
flew in. It was once known as the "Wailing Mora"
by the people of Mergoda, a fearsome bird that the
White Dragon himself repelled. If left unchecked,
it could pose a threat to the entire land of
Lestania.

column3:
ザンドラ禁域の一画、錬金の秘術に
魅せられた者たちが潜み独自の研究を
繰り広げていた場所
現在もその名残の書物などが散乱するが
肝心の研究者たちがどこに消えたかは不明
column4:
In a corner of the Zandora Wastelands, where
people fascinated by the secrets of alchemy hid,
they carried out their own research. Even now,
remnants of their studies such as books can be
found scattered about, but the whereabouts of the
researchers themselves remain unknown.

column3:
禁域のどこかにあるらしい地下泉
祝福を受けた泉は高位の術師が管理していた
そうだが現在はその場所すら定かでない
column4:
There seems to be an underground spring somewhere
in the restricted area.
The blessed spring was managed by a high-ranking
sorcerer, but now, even the exact location is
uncertain.

column3:
ザンドラ禁域北端、地上に残った外周部
メルゴダ入り口にあたる区画であり、政治と深く
関わる錬金術研究の中心地であった。そのため
最も警戒すべき場所として、神殿により禁域と
して秘匿されてきた
column4:
Located at the northern border of Zandora
Wastelands, this is the section that corresponds
to the entrance of Mergoda.
It was the hub of alchemized research closely
intertwined with politics.
As a result, it has been concealed as a forbidden
area by the temple, making it the most guarded of
places.

column3:
ザンドラ禁域を東西に結ぶ大地下水路
セラー湖の水をメルゴダへ送るため整備された
水路であったが、現在は恐ろしい魔物の潜む
大迷路と化している
column4:
The Underground Waterway that connects the
Zandora Wastelands from east to west.
Was originally constructed to transport water
from Lake Cera to Mergoda.
However, it has now transformed into a terrifying
labyrinth infested with dangerous enemies.

column3:
旧時代、錬金研究の実験所だった地下施設
現在内部がどうなっているかは不明だが
秘術の実験体など忌まわしい研究の産物が
潜んでいる可能性は大きい
column4:
In the past, it was an underground facility for
alchemic research. The current state of its
interior is unknown. However, there is a high
possibility that abominable creations of forbidden
experiments, such as experimental subjects of
secret arts, may be lurking.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
《南ザンドラ遺跡群》の一角にある旧時代の井戸
これまではその存在すら忘れられていたが
恐ろしい咆哮が奥から遺跡群一帯に響くようになった
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Treasure】Door</COL>
An ancient well in a corner of the "South Zandora
Ruins".
Its existence had been forgotten until now, but a
terrifying roar began to echo throughout the
entire ruins.

オーク軍が拠点とする北西の荒地
バートランド平原以北は魔物の支配する厳しい地
であるが、ドラワンの民は故郷を守り今日まで暮ら
してきた。また、北にかかる巨大な橋は《禁じられ
た地》に続くとされ、この地の者さえ近づかない
column4:
The barren land in the northwest that serves as
the base for the Orc army.
The area north of Betland Plains is a harsh land
ruled by enemies, but the people of Drawan have
managed to protect their homeland and live to this
day. Furthermore, it is said that the enormous
bridge to the north leads to the "Forbidden Land,"
a place even the locals dare not approach.

column3:
オークの根城に近い辺境の村
人がハイデル平原以南での防衛を決めてからこれ
まで、外部との交流はほとんど途絶えていた
厳しい環境ながら、故郷に残ると決めた者達により
村は守られ、細々と営みは続けられている
column4:
A remove village, located near the orc stronghold.
Has had little contact with the outside world
since the people decided to defend themselves in
the southern Hidell Plains. Despite the harsh
conditions, the villagers who chose to stay in
their homeland have managed to protect the village
and continue their modest livelihood.

column3:
長きに渡り閉ざされてきた大橋の門が開いた
この先は、禁じられた地・ザンドラへと続いている
禁域へ足を踏み入れるのであれば
相応の覚悟と実力が必要となる
column4:
After a long time of being closed, the gates of
the bridge have opened.
Beyond this point lies the Forbidden Land of
Zandora.
If you wish to step foot into this forbidden
territory, you will need the appropriate resolve
and strength.

column3:
オーク本陣ガルドノック砦の正面、橋のたもとに
遠征準備中のオーク小隊が待機している
準備中の小隊を確認した場合は、他の任務より
オーク出撃阻止を優先すべきだろう
column4:
In front of Gardnox Fortress, at the base of the
bridge, an Orc squad is waiting in preparation for
an expedition.
If you confirm the squad's readiness, it should
take precedence over other missions to prevent the
Orc's deployment.

column3:
ドラワン教会の地下に作られた富裕層向け公共墓地
だが死体を貪る悪鬼が司祭を襲い、墓地に侵入
するという事件以降、地下への扉は固く施錠された
それ以来、教会を訪れる者はほとんどいない
column4:
A public cemetery for the wealthy was built in
the basement of Drawan Church.
However, after an incident where a greedy demon
attacked the priest and invaded the cemetery, the
door to the basement has been firmly locked.
Since then, very few people have visited the
church.

column3:
北バートランド東部の丘上に、オークが魔犬を
育成、訓練している場所が確認された
ここで特別に育てられたグリムワーグは斥候や
強襲に使われるため、そうなる前に手を打つことが
望ましい
column4:
On the hills in the eastern part of North
Betland, a place where Orcs breed and train
canines called Grimwargs, has been confirmed.
It is desirable to take action before these
specially bred Grimwargs are used for scouting and
assault.

column3:
テゴル川河岸にある治水路
旧時代に作られた水路の中で、ガルドノック砦に
近いことからいち早く魔物に占拠された
内部は汚水が溢れ、封鎖された当時から酷い状況
だったという。使えるものがあるかは不明
column4:
The flood control ditch on the banks of the Tegor
River.
Among the old waterways created during ancient
times, it was one of the first to be occupied by
monsters due to its proximity to Gardnox Fortress.
The interior was filled with dirty water and has
been in a terrible condition since it was sealed
off.
It is unknown if there is anything usable inside.

column3:
ガルドノック砦の南、哨戒地に頑丈な鱗ととりわけ
するどい牙を持つ地竜が出現した。どうやら
オーク軍が、次なるグリッテン砦への一手として
用意した軍竜のようだ
放置すれば本格的な脅威となるだろう
column4:
A strong Earth Dragon with durable scales and
especially sharp fangs has appeared in the
southern part of Gardnox Fortress, in the patrol
area.
It seems that the Orc army has prepared this
dragon unit as their next move towards Fort
Gritten.
If left unattended, it will become a significant
threat.

column3:
オークが根城とする大砦《ガルドノック砦》において
戦力の中核を担う地位にあるオークがいる詰所
近頃妙にオークの出入りが多く、周囲の住人からは
この《戦鬼の陣屋》にて何らかの作戦会議が
行われているのではないかと不安の声が上がっている
column4:
In the great fortress "Fort Galdnok" where the
orcs have their stronghold, there is an orc camp
where orcs are in a position to play a central
role in the war.
Recently, orcs have been coming and going
strangely, and the surrounding residents are
concerned that some kind of strategy meeting is
being held in this "War Demons' Encampment".

column3:
騎士団がガルドノック砦を守っていたその昔
資材庫だった地下室
現在はここもまた、オークや魔物の支配下にある
column4:
Back in the day when the Knights defended Gardnox
Fortress, the basement used to be a storehouse of
materials.
Now this place is also under the control of orcs
and demons.

column3:
バートランド平原北部、ガルドノック砦に
近い井戸。長らく放置されているため
雨風にさらされ朽ちかけている
column4:
A well near Gardnox Fortress in the Northern
Betland Plains.
It has been left untouched for a long time,
exposed to wind and rain and on the verge of
decay.

column3:
バートランド北部からセラー湖の岸辺に繋がる
地下道。ガルドノック砦がオークに占領される前
騎士団が通り道や保管庫として作ったものである
らしい。もちろん、現在利用している人間はいない
column4:
An underground passage from the northern part of
Betland to the shores of Lake Cera.
It seems that the knight order built it as a
thoroughfare and storage facility before Gardnox
Fortress was occupied by orcs.
Of course, there are no humans currently using it.

column3:
オーク軍が根城とする旧時代の大砦
かつては立派な外堀を持つ騎士団の砦だったが
白竜が墜ちて後オークに占領され、恐ろしい魔物の
城と化した。首領モゴックが手勢を率い、この砦を
起点にハイデルへの侵略を企てている
column4:
Formerly a fortress of the knight's order that
had an impressive moat.
It has now been occupied by orcs after the fall
of the White Dragon, transforming into a
terrifying stronghold of monstrous creatures.
The leader Mogok leads his forces from this
fortress, plotting an invasion of Heidell.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
《ガルドノック砦》の奥から続き、テゴル川の水を
堀へと引き込むための水廊。未だオークが根城とする
この場所に、侵食の影響を受けた個体が存在している
らしい。脅威が拡散する前に、芽を摘む必要がある
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
Continuing from the depths of Gardnox Fortress,
this water corridor is used to draw the water from
the Tegor River into the moat.
It seems that there are infected individuals
affected by corruption still inhabiting this
place, which the orcs still use as their
stronghold.
It is necessary to nip this threat in the bud
before it spreads.

column3: 支援品の配給
《双輪の谷》に新たな強敵が出現
column4: New powerful enemy at "Twin Wheel Valley"

column3: 支援品ランクアップ
《バンデッドホーント》に新たな強敵が出現
《南メルゴダ遺跡群》に新たな強敵が出現
column4: New powerful enemy at "South Mergoda Ruins"

column3: 封鎖エリア《メルゴダ大水網》開放
支援品ランクアップ
《オーク残党宿営地》に新たな強敵が出現
column4: New powerful enemy at "Orc Remnants Camp"

column3: 《黒淵谷》に新たな強敵が出現
column4: New powerful enemy at "Black Abyss Valley"

column3: 支援品ランクアップ
《ザンドラ禁域》各地にある未解放のリム転移 解放
《狂信者の潜伏地》に新たな強敵が出現
column4: New powerful enemy at "Fanatic's Hiding Ground"

column3: 封鎖エリア《叫びの竪穴》開放
《叫びの竪穴》に新たな強敵が出現
column4: New powerful enemy at "Pit of Screams"

column3: 支援品ランクアップ

フィンダム大陸中部に広がる平原
起伏が多いフィンダムにおいて、ファーラナ平原は
なだらかで活用しやすい地形をしている
また、他の地域と比較すると侵食の度合は
緩やかなようで侵食魔の数も少ない
column4:
The Farana Plains, located in the central part of
the Phindym continent, are characterized by gently
rolling terrain, making them easy to utilize in
the varied landscape of Phindym.
Furthermore, compared to other regions, the level
of corruption is relatively low, resulting in
fewer corrupted creatures.

column3:
フィンダム大陸の中央部
精霊竜がねぐらとしている《芯なる樹》が
青々と生い茂る様は、フィンダム大陸の
どの拠点からでも眺めることができる
人々はその壮大さに確かな加護を感じて過ごしていた
column4:
In the central part of the Phindym continent, the
Spirit Dragon's habitat, the "Core Tree", thrives
with lush greenery, which can be observed from any
stronghold in Phindym.
People feel a definite blessing in its grandeur
as they go about their lives.

column3:
ファーラナ平原に位置する戦士の村
武勇を最も尊ぶ部族が住まい、住人たちは
日々鍛錬と戦いに明け暮れている
力に裏付けされてか、地理的な理由に寄るものか
比較的侵食の影響を受けずに生活している
column4:
A village of warriors located in the Farana
Plains.
The inhabitants, who hold valor in the highest
regard, spend their days immersed in training and
battles.
Whether supported by their strength or due to
geographical reasons, they live relatively
unaffected by corruption.

column3:
ダナの村の近くに佇む庵
《スピリットランサー》のジョブマスターである
勇壮な槍士アデルドナハが住んでいる
見込みのある者に対しては、自身のもつ
技術を伝授することもあるという
column4:
Near Dana Village stands a hermitage, where the
brave Job Master of the Spirit Lancers, Adair
Donnchadh, resides.
It is said that he also imparts his skills to
promising individuals.

column3:
ファーラナ平原の片隅、大岩の割れ目に
隠れるようにして作られた小さな集落
一切の外部との交流を断った結果、非常に独特な
文化を形成するにいたった一族が住んでいる
column4:
In a corner of the Farana Plains, in a crack in a
large rock, there lives a small hidden settlement
inhabited by a tribe that has developed a very
unique culture as a result of refusing all contact
with the outside world.

column3:
精霊竜が棲む《始まりの洞》下層に位置する拠点
精霊竜の守りをする者たちや訪れた人々が
暫しの休息を得るための場となっている
column4:
Base camp located in the lower level of the
Hollow of Beginnings, where the Spirit Dragon
resides.
It serves as a place for the protectors of the
Spirit Dragon and for those who have visited to
find temporary rest and respite.

column3:
《芯なる樹》の最深部
侵食による影響が出るまでは、精霊竜との
謁見などはこの場所で行われていた
精霊竜の守りとして選ばれた者たちが控えていた
集いの間と隣接している
column4:
The deepest part of the "Core Tree".
Until the effects of corruption took hold,
meetings with the Spirit Dragon were held in this
location.
Those chosen as guardians of the Spirit Dragon
awaited in the adjacent Gathering Hall.

column3:
ファーラナ平原にぽつりと佇む住居の遺跡
古くはこの場所にダナの村があったのだが
拓けた場という防御面の弱さが問題視され
地形が入り組み敵の進入を妨げる現在の
場に移り住んだ
column4:
In the Farana Plains, stands the ruins of a
dwelling, all by itself.
Long ago, there was a village called Dana in this
place.
However, the vulnerability of this wide-open area
in terms of defense was seen as an issue.
So they moved to the current location, where the
terrain is intricate and hinders enemy
infiltration.

column3:
ファーラナ遺跡の周辺にある円形遺跡
在りし日は戦士たちが武を競う闘技場として
使用されていたらしいが、当時の柱などは
ほとんど倒壊してしまっているため
現在は特に注目されることもない
column4:
The circular ruins near the Farana Ruins.
Used to be a battlefield where warriors competed,
but most of the columns from that time have
collapsed, so there is currently no particular
attention given to it.

column3:
ファーラナ平原の山肌にあるニュートの巣穴
そう深さは無く、食糧を貯蓄している様子も無いので
恐らく休息を得る目的で作られたのだろう
見張りを立てて交替で使用しているのか、入口
付近では常にニュートが目を光らせている
column4:
On the mountainside of the Farana Plains, there
is a Newt Den.
It doesn't appear to be very deep, and there
doesn't seem to be any stored food, so it was
probably made for the purpose of resting.
Near the entrance, the Newts always keep watch,
taking turns to stand guard.

column3:
ファーラナ平原の《マグサス古水路》入口付近、岩が
立ち並ぶ周辺。巨大な岩が数個露出している以外は
特に目立つものも無い場所であるが、鎧の擦れる音が
聞こえたり、視界の端に巨大な剣が見えたという
報告が絶えない
column4:
Near the entrance of Magusas Ancient Watercourse
in the Farana Plains, there is a surrounding area
with rocks scattered about.
Other than a few exposed giant rocks, there is
nothing particularly noticeable about this place.
However, there are constant reports of hearing
the sound of armor scraping and seeing a giant
sword at the edge of one's field of vision.

column3:
ファーラナ平原奥地にある湿地帯
霧が発生しやすく視界が悪いことが多い
甲竜が棲息しており、目を凝らせば霧の
奥でゆっくりと動く巨影を確認することができる
column4:
In the depths of the Farana Plains, there is a
marshland where mist often forms, making
visibility poor.
Beasts known as "Shell Dragons" reside there, and
if you focus your eyes, you can confirm the
slow-moving silhouette deep within the mist.

column3:
ファーラナ平原とエラン水林を繋ぐ谷あい
の道、中ほどにある少し拓けた場所
周囲を崖に囲まれているため、大型の魔物が
身を隠して羽根を休めるための巣として
利用している
column4:
A slightly open place in the middle of the road
connecting the Farana Plains and the Elan Water
Grove.
The surrounding cliffs make it a nest for large
monsters to hide and rest their wings.

column3:
ファーラナ平原の川中に浮かぶ陸地
周辺は水深が浅く、水没してはいるものの
歩き回ることが可能。ただし、汚泥が流れ着く
ことも多いらしく、不浄の魔物がさ迷っている
こともある
column4:
A piece of land floating in the middle of the
river in the Farana Plains.
The surrounding waters are shallow, allowing for
exploration on foot, despite periodic submersion.
However, it appears that mud and debris often
accumulate here, leading to the presence of foul
creatures wandering about.

column3:
戦士の村であるダナ付近にある廟堂
ダナには、自らの武勇の証を立てるため
この廟堂に巣食う魔物を倒してみせるという
文化が存在する。ただし、かつては頻繁に行われて
いたらしいが、現代において使用されることはごく稀
column4:
There is a shrine near the village of warriors,
called Dana.
In order to prove their bravery, there is a
cultural tradition of defeating the monsters that
inhabit this shrine.
However, it is very rare for this tradition to be
practiced in modern times.

column3:
古代に住居として使用されていたらしき洞窟
最近はピクシーが棲みつき、人間が足を
踏み入れることは難しい状況にある。奥は猛獣が
縄張りとしているとの情報もあったが
ピクシーたちが必死に通路を塞いだようだ
column4:
It appears that this cave was once used as a
dwelling in ancient times.
Recently, it has been inhabited by pixies, making
it difficult for humans to enter.
There is also information that there are fierce
animals deep inside, but it seems that the pixies
have desperately blocked the passage.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
ファーラナ平原中で最大規模の遺跡
多少崩壊している箇所もあるが全体の作りは堅固
であり、魔物に侵入されるまでは過去の貴重な
文献などを保管する書庫として活用されてきた
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone】 Door</COL>
The largest archaeological site in the Farana
Plains, with some areas showing signs of collapse,
but the overall structure is solid.
It was once used as a repository for valuable
historical documents, storing them until it was
invaded by enemies.

column3:
古将マグサスを始めとした歴戦の猛者たちが
眠る墓所。水路も兼ねていたが、いつの頃からか
ウィルムが棲みつき、慰霊のために訪れる者は
いなくなった。まれに、副葬品狙いの墓荒らしが
命知らずにも入り込むことがあるらしい
column4:
The resting place of seasoned warriors, including
the ancient hero Magusas.
While also serving as a waterway, it has been
inhabited by a Wyrm for quite some time now, and
those who used to visit to pay their respects have
disappeared.
Occasionally, grave robbers, driven by the desire
for burial artifacts, dare to venture in
unknowingly.

column3:
芯なる樹と聖塔が融合した《始まりの洞》内部
へと続く回廊。塔自体は数千年前から存在する
ものであるが、芯なる樹に支えられていることで
非常に良い状態で保たれている
column4:
Corridor leading to the Hollow of Beginnings,
where the Core Tree and the Holy Tower have
merged. Although the tower itself has been in
existence for thousands of years, it is kept in
very good condition thanks to the support of the
Core Tree.

column3:
《精霊竜のねぐら》へと続くらせん状の階段を
有した空間。空気中に満ちた竜力の加護か、
これだけの長い階段を上ってもまるで足の痛みを
感じることが無いという
column4:
A spiraling staircase leading to the "Spirit
Dragon's Roost."
Perhaps due to the divine protection of the
Dragon Force permeating the air, one can ascend
this long staircase without feeling any pain in
their feet.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【財宝】の扉あり</COL>
大量の水を湛えた自然の地下洞窟を元に作られた
集水路。今まで水が枯れたことは無く、手入れが
必要無かったことから最低限しか手が入れられて
いない。最近は水竜が棲みついているとの噂もある
column4:
<COL ffdc78>[Treasure] Door</COL>
A canal that was built based on a natural
underground cave filled with a large amount of
water.
The water has never dried up before and minimal
maintenance has been carried out because it has
not been necessary.
There have been rumors recently that water
dragons have made it their habitat.

column3:
精霊竜が棲む、《芯なる樹》の頂上部
フィンダム大陸中で最も竜力に満ちた
清浄な空間であったが、精霊竜が毒に
侵されたことにより、苦痛と禍々しさに
溢れる場所となった
column4:
At the top of the "Core Tree," where the "Spirit
Dragon" resides.
The place most filled with "Dragon Force" in the
entire continent of Phindym.
It was once a pure space, but due to the Spirit
Dragon being tainted by poison, it has become a
place filled with pain and malevolence.

column3:
《芯なる樹》の太い根が伸び、聖域の影響が
色濃く出た遺跡。入口が崩落してはいるが
そのせいもあってか人が入った形跡は最小限に
保たれている
column4:
The thick roots of the "Core Tree" stretch out,
and the influence of the Sacred Grounds is
strongly felt.
Although the entrance has collapsed, and perhaps
because of that, there are minimal signs of anyone
entering.

column3:
かつてはフィンダム中から学者たちが集う学研の場で
あった小塔。魔物の襲撃を受けて放棄されたのち
ピクシーの大きな群れが移住した。位の高い
ピクシーは高所を好むため、小塔の上階には群れ
の長もしくは準ずる個体が生息していると思われる
column4:
A small tower in the midst of Phindym, where
scholars gathered in the past.
After being abandoned due to enemy raids, a large
group of Pixies migrated there.
Pixies of high rank prefer high places, so it is
believed that the leader or a similar individual
of the group resides on the upper floor of the
tower.

column3:
ファーラナ平原の少し奥まった高台に建つ小塔
以前は代々内部で暮らす者たちがいたものの
彼らは二百年近く前に突然塔から出てダナ村に
合流したという。それ以来、たまに掃除に訪れる
者がいる程度で普段は無人となっている
column4:
On a slightly secluded hill in Farana Plains,
there is a small tower.
Previously, there were people living inside for
generations.
However, about two hundred years ago, they
suddenly left the tower and joined Dana Village.
Since then, it has been uninhabited, with only
occasional visitors for cleaning.

column3: ハイデル平原
白竜神殿レーゼ
テル

鬼鳴き橋
ハイデル地下霊廟

血すすぎ河原
黒狼団のアジト
ハイデル地下霊廟　深部
ハイデル地下霊廟　最深部

修練の祠
廃屋の地下室
狩人の抜け穴
テルの枯れ井戸
ハイデル街道の枯れ井戸
