平原の廃墟地下室
アーク
アーク　裏層

アッカーシェラン大陸のほぼ中央に位置する地域
荒涼とした風景が広がるこの地域には竜の神殿があり、
その神殿に寄り添うように王都メガドが建造された
要塞を思わせる王都はアッカー家三代目当主キリークの
治世に計画され、完成は十四代目当主ドラフの
即位目前であった
column4:
Located almost in the centre of Acre Selund, this
area is characterized by a barren landscape.
In this region, there is a dragon temple, and
adjacent to the temple, the royal capital of
Megado was built, resembling a fortress.
The construction of this royal capital was
planned during the reign of Kilik, the third head
of the Acre family, and it was completed just
before the coronation of Doraf, the fourteenth
head.

column3:
メガドシスの土地に焼きついた歴史の世界
悪しき竜が現れたことにより、各地を巡る竜力にも
異変が起きた。その結果、土地の持っている“記憶”
というべきものにすら歪みが生じているようだ
column4:
The world of history engraved into the land of
Megado.
Various anomalies have occurred in the Dragon
Force that travel across the land, due to the
appearance of the evil dragon.
As a result, even the "memories" that the land
holds seem to have become distorted.

column3:
メガド周辺を警備する目的で使われる監視塔
すでに地上階は魔軍により占拠されているが
魔物たちは地下階の存在には気付かなかったようだ
地下階には、メガド陥落の折に逃げ延びた兵士たちが
救援を信じ、息を殺すように潜んでいる
column4:
A surveillance tower is used to secure the
surroundings of Megado.
The ground floors have already been occupied by
the demon army, but it seems like they were
unaware of the existence of the underground
floors.
Soldiers who managed to escape during the fall of
Megado are hiding in the underground floors,
holding their breath as they believe in the
possibility of rescue.

column3:
王家に仕えるハイセプター、キルスティが住む小屋
魔物によって民が苦しむアッカーシェランを憂い
秘術であるハイセプターの戦闘術を世に広めんと
慣れぬあばら家で暮らしているらしい
column4:
The cottage where Kirsty, serving the royal
family, lives.
She worries about Acre Selund, where the people
suffer due to monsters.
Thus, she endeavors to spread the combat
techniques of the High Scepter, a secret art.
It seems that she lives in an unfamiliar, rundown
house.

column3:
城塞都市メガドにて一般市民が住まう居住層
メガド全体から見ると下層にあたり、大陸の人口の
過半数が暮らしていた
長きに渡り繁栄を誇っていたが、魔軍の急襲に
よって蹂躙され、多くの住民が命を落とした
column4:
In the residential layer of Fortress City Megado,
where ordinary citizens reside, it is known as the
lower level and where over half of the continent's
population lived.
It had been prosperous for a long time, but it
was devastated by a sudden attack from the Demon
Army, and many residents lost their lives.

column3:
白い木で作られた簡易な柵は、アンセスターオークが
縄張りを誇示する際に多用されるもの
賢明な旅人であれば忌避すべき“危険”の標である
column4:
The simple fence made of white wood is often used
by Ancestor Orcs to showcase their territory, and
it serves as a "danger" sign that wise travelers
should avoid.

column3:
火垂れ山から飛来した巨大な噴石とその周辺
岩は鳥が羽根を休め、獣が身を隠すのに
ちょうどよかったらしく様々な獣たちが住処として
いるようだ
column4:
A huge volcanic rock from the Firefall Mountain
and its surrounding rocks were perfect for birds
to rest their feathers and for animals to hide.
It seems that various animals have made this
place their habitat.

column3:
水辺に面した小さな洞穴
霧の森から漏れ出でたものが留まりやすい
風の音が何事かを囁いているように聞こえる
ことから、以前より不気味な噂が立っている
column4:
A small cave facing the water's edge where things
leaking out of the Forest of Mist tend to stay.
The sound of the wind seems to whisper something,
which has led to eerie rumors for some time now.

column3:
霧の森の中にある焼け野原
忌まわしい考えに取り付かれたある女が
多数の犠牲者を洗脳し、自ら炎の中へと
飛び込ませたという事件が起こった場所
事件から何十年と経過しているが、未だに
土は焼けたままであり草木も回復していない
column4:
A burnt field in the Forest of Mist.
This is where a woman obsessed with abominable
thoughts brainwashed numerous victims and forced
them to jump
into the flames themselves.
Decades have passed since the incident, yet the
soil remains burned and the grass and trees have
not recovered.

column3:
城塞都市メガドの城門外に設えられた詰所
元は商人らが優先的にメガドへ入るための手続きを
受けていた場であるが、現在は出撃の令を待つ
ドワーフオークや、軍属の獣たちがひしめいている
column4:
Outside the gates of the fortress city Megado,
there is a guard post set up.
Originally, it was a place where merchants would
go through the necessary procedures to enter
Megado.
However, it is now crowded with dwarf orcs and
military animals waiting for the order to march
out.

column3:
メガド居住層の奥に造られた野ざらしの牢屋
魔軍の襲撃から逃げられず、また不幸にも生け捕りに
された人々がドワーフオークから無残な拷問を受けた
であろうことは、その場に生々しく残る痕跡から容易
に察することができる
column4:
Hidden prison exposed beyond the depths of the
Megado residential layer; it is easy to deduce
from the vivid traces left behind that the
unfortunate individuals who were unable to escape
the onslaught of the Demon Army have fallen into
the hands of the Orcs and likely suffered gruesome
torture.

column3:
王家の命により封鎖されている地下道
王族関連施設に繋がるであろうという
推測以外、情報が無い場所でもある
何らかの意図を持って隠されている場で
あることは確かだ
column4:
The underground passage is sealed off by the
royal family's orders.
It is a place where there is no information other
than speculation that it may be connected to
facilities related to the royal family.
It is certain that it is hidden with some
intention.

column3:
城塞都市メガドの防衛の要となるニルビリス大橋と
その上に建つ関所。魔軍側も本関所の重要性は
理解しているらしく、防衛のために随時戦力を
割いている。関所の開閉については、魔軍の
集結具合と連動しているらしい
column4:
The Nilviris Bridge, which serves as a crucial
defense point for the fortress city of Megado,
accompanied by a checkpoint built on top of it.
It appears that the Demon Army also understands
the importance of this checkpoint, as they are
constantly dedicating forces to its defense.
The opening and closing of the checkpoint seem to
be synchronized with the gathering of the Demon
Army.

column3:
メガド城壁内、最奥に位置する広場
ドワーフオークが捕えた魔物に対して戦甲を
装着するために使われている。魔物は戦甲に
よって自らの意思を制御され、ドワーフオークに
使役される存在となる
column4:
Inside Megado Castle, at the very back, there is
a plaza where beasts captured by Dwarf Orcs are
dressed in battle armor.
The enemies are controlled by the battle armor,
making them subservient to the Dwarf Orcs.

column3:
フェルヤナ荒原の山壁側からメガドシス高地
中心部を繋ぐ通路。かつては頻繁に使われていたが
渓谷を渡る船や家畜を使っての山越えが主流となって
からは、たまに狩人らが利用するのみとなっていた
メガド周辺が魔軍に包囲された際、徒歩での脱出を
試みる者にはこの古道しか残されていなかった
column4:
From the mountain wall side of the Feryana
Wilderness to the center of the Megadosys Plateau,
there is a pathway.
It used to be frequently used, but now crossing
the mountains using livestock or ships to cross
the valley has become the mainstream.
Only occasionally do hunters use it now.
When the area around Megado was surrounded by the
Demon Army, those who attempted to escape on foot
had no choice but to use this ancient path.

column3:
大地の陥没からなる自然豊かな洞窟
目立たない場所に位置することと、陽の光が差し込む
構造から内部には緑が生い茂り、野生動物たちが棲む
今となっては、悪しき竜と魔軍の所業によって荒廃する
前の“アッカーシェランの自然”が残る貴重な場所
column4:
A natural and abundant cave formed by the
collapse of the surface.
Located in an inconspicuous place, it is filled
with greenery and inhabited by wild animals,
thanks to the structure that allows sunlight to
penetrate it.
It is now in a state of ruin due to the deeds of
the evil dragon and the demon army.
This is a precious place where the remnants of
the previous "Self" of Acre Selund remain.

column3: ニルビリス大橋からメガド居住層へと繋がる地下水路
column4:
From Nilviris Bridge, an underground waterway
leads to the Megado residential layer.

column3:
城塞都市メガド市民の生活を支える上水道
都市には無くてはならない設備だが、汚水を飲む
ことに慣れたドワーフオークたちは重要性を見出さず
魔軍の中継基地として使っている
column4:
Fortress City Megado's water supply supports the
lives of its citizens.
Although it is an essential facility for the
city, the Dwarf Orcs, who have become accustomed
to drinking sewage, fail to recognize its
importance and instead use it as a relay base for
the Demon Army.

column3:
メガド王宮層の周辺には王宮層を取り囲むように
複数の建造物が円形に立ち並び、それぞれ左右に
伸びた通路で繋がっている。元は回廊であったため
現在もそれらの建造物の総称として≪メガド回廊≫
という呼称が用いられている
column4:
Around the Megado Palace on the Megado Royal
Layer, multiple buildings are arranged in a
circle, connected by corridors extending left and
right.
Originally a corridor, they are still
collectively referred to as the "Megado Corridor."

column3:
城塞都市メガドの最上部に位置する王宮
王族とそれに連なる限られた者のみが居住する
ことを許された場所であり、厳重に守られている
一般市民がこの場を直に目にすることは
人生の中で恐らく一度も無いだろう
column4:
At the top of Fortress City Megado stands the
royal palace, a place allowed only to the royal
family and a select few.
It is heavily guarded and unlikely for ordinary
citizens to ever lay eyes upon in their lifetime.

column3:
メガド王宮層を囲むように建てられた建造物の内
聖堂として使われていた場所
王族の挙式や戴冠式の際は、大陸中から集まった
有力な貴族が一堂に会する
column4:
Within the buildings built around the Megado
Royal Palace Layer, a place that was used as a
cathedral.
During royal weddings and coronations, prominent
nobles from all over the continent would gather
together.

column3:
戦士の修行を目的とし、様々な種類の魔物が
わざと放たれている祠。以前は王族を護る者たちが
平時にあってもその腕を鈍らせないようにと鍛練に
励んでいた場所であるが、近年はひたすらに武を
誇る風潮が薄れたため使用されることも減り、内部の
魔物のみが取り残されている
column4:
The shrine, which is intentionally filled with
various types of enemies, serves as a training
ground for soldiers.
In the past, it was a place where those who
protected the royal family trained to keep their
skills sharp even during times of peace.
However, in recent years, the enthusiasm for
showcasing one's martial prowess has diminished,
resulting in a decrease in its usage.
As a result, only the monsters inside the shrine
remain.

column3:
フィンダム随一の森林地帯
樹木や草花、多様な獣といった森の恩恵を
受けられるこの地の特性は、反面侵食の影響が
最も色濃く発現する悲劇を招いた。生命力に
溢れていた森は今や赤く立ち枯れている箇所が目立つ
column4:
The premier woodland region of Phindym, where one
can enjoy the benefits of the forest, including
trees, flowers, and a variety of animals.
However, the characteristic of this land also
brings about the tragic manifestation of the most
intense corruption and infection.
The once vibrant forest now stands with prominent
red decay.

column3:
モロー樹林にある、木々に囲まれた村
代々精霊竜の守りをしてきた一族が住まう
そのせいか理知的な者が多く、学者を多数
輩出してきた。威厳ある族長・ガラダに
よって統治されている
column4:
In the Morrow Forest, there is a village
surrounded by trees, where a clan that has been
guarding the Spirit Dragon for generations
resides.
Perhaps because of this, there are many
intellectual individuals, and they have produced
numerous scholars.
They are ruled by the dignified chieftain,
Gearóid.

column3:
モルフォール周辺にある巨岩群
いずれかの巨岩の下に高名な賢者ティルカンが
眠ると言われている。残念ながら、墓となる岩を
特定するための情報は失われている
column4:
A group of giant rocks in the vicinity of
Morfaul.
It is said that a renowned sage named Tilkan
sleeps under one of the rocks.
Unfortunately, the information to identify the
specific rock that serves as his grave is lost.

column3:
モロー樹林西部にある、ゴブリンが小さな群れを
形成して潜んでいた一帯。この小さな群れは
あまり攻撃性が高くなかったとみられ、ひっそりと
森の奥で暮らしていたらしい。しかし、今は侵食に
よって凶暴になってしまっているため注意が必要
column4:
In the Morrow Forest in the west, a small group
of Goblins has formed and hidden.
This small group appeared to have low
aggressiveness and quietly lived deep in the
forest.
However, they have become dangerously aggressive
due to corruption, so caution is necessary.

column3:
《モローケイヴァン》入口付近の木立
この辺りの土壌、木々は侵食が進むあまり
もはや目を覆いたくなるような状況である
緑豊かだった木々は今や立ち枯れ、菌糸体を
まとって赤くひび割れてすらいる
column4:
Near the entrance of Morrow Cavern, the
surrounding grove is in such a state of corruption
and infected that it becomes unbearable to look
at.
The once lush trees are now standing dead,
covered in reddened cracks and even infected with
mycelium.

column3:
モルフォールの裏手にあるピクシーたちの野営地
家畜や農作物をこっそり盗むのが元々の目的だった
のだろうが、侵食されたピクシーたちには最早
そういった知性は無く、恐らく侵食前の習慣に従い
辺りをうろついているのだと推測されている
column4:
Camp of Pixies behind Morfaul.
Originally, their purpose was to secretly steal
livestock and crops.
However, the Pixies who have been corrupted no
longer possess such intelligence, and it is
speculated that they are simply wandering around
based on their habits before corruption.

column3:
以前は人が暮らす小さな拠点として機能していたが
侵食魔に脅かされた住人たちは土地を捨てて
逃げることを選び、現在は魔物が闊歩するのみ
となっている
column4:
It used to function as a small hub of human
habitation, but threatened by the invading demons,
the residents chose to abandon their land and
flee, and now it is only a place where demons
roam.

column3:
モロー樹林地域に現存する唯一の遺跡
大変古い小神殿の遺跡だと思われるが
殆ど倒壊しており痕跡が確認できるのみである
また、周囲には魔物が棲みつき始めたため
いよいよ誰も近寄らない場所となってしまった
column4:
Translation: It is believed to be the only
remaining ruins in the Morrow Forest region.
Though it appears to be the remnants of a very
ancient shrine, it has mostly collapsed and only
traces can be observed. Furthermore, due to the
presence of enemy creatures in the vicinity, it
has become a place that nobody dares to approach
anymore.

column3:
<SPOT 964>にある木立
土壌の侵食が進み、木々も草花も
立ったままの姿で色褪せ、枯れかかっている
辺りに住んでいた小型の魔物たちも
残らず侵食が進んだ状態となっている
column4:
At <SPOT 964>, the surrounding trees are fading
away and withering, with the soil being corrupted.
Even the small creatures that once inhabited the
area have been completely infected.

column3:
<SPOT 964>に位置する窪地
青い芝に覆われた小動物の住み処は、いまや
剥き出しの土の上に不気味な菌糸体を
はびこらせている。広々とした地形は大型の
魔物が巣食いやすく危険である
column4:
Located at <SPOT 964>, this depression which was
once covered in green grass, is now overrun with
eerie mycelium spread across the exposed earth.
The spacious terrain makes it dangerous and a
suitable nest for large monsters.

column3:
《ノーザナス侵林》入口のある崖の下に
広がる平地。封鎖されている侵林に
引き寄せられているのか、侵食が進んだ
有翼の魔物たちがしきりにこの辺りを
さまよう姿が確認されている
column4:
A flat area of land spreading out under the cliff
where the entrance to the Northerners Infected
Woods is
located.
It is confirmed that winged beasts, infected by
corruption, are frequently wandering around this
area.

column3:
元はピクシーの群れが棲みついていた洞窟だったが
何らかの侵食魔の襲撃を受けたことがきっかけで
群れ全体に侵食が蔓延してしまったと推測される
侵食の度合から見て、ピクシーたちを襲った魔物は
洞窟の奥に潜んでいるらしい
column4:
The original cave was once inhabited by a group
of Pixies, but it was attacked by some kind of
corrupted creature, causing the corruption to
spread throughout the entire group.
Based on the extent of the corruption, it is
speculated that the creature that attacked the
Pixies is lurking deep within the cave.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【竜力】の扉あり</COL>
元は採掘場として人でにぎわっていた洞窟
侵食による影響が発見されてからの進行がはやく
人々は採掘道具すら回収しきらぬままに撤退したが
情報が行きわたらず取り残された者もいた
column4:
<COL ffdc78>[Dragon Force] Door</COL>
Originally, the cave was bustling with people as
a mining site.
However, the progress since the discovery of the
effects of corruption has been rapid.
People withdrew without even fully recovering
their mining tools, but there were some who were
left behind without receiving any information.

column3:
モロー樹林北部、特に侵食が進んだ一帯にある
封鎖された森林。侵食前より森の強者が棲むとされ、
人が迷いこむことが無いようにと封鎖されていた場所
奥を確かめた者はいないが、凶暴な魔物が侵食された
状態にあることは確実であり、危険度は高い
column4:
The sealed forest located in the northern part of
Morrow Forest, where corruption has particularly
advanced.
It is said to be inhabited by powerful beings of
the forest, and it was sealed off to prevent
people from getting lost.
No one has ventured deep inside, but it is
certain that ferocious monsters have been
infected. The level of danger is high.

column3:
モロー樹林北西部にある封鎖された森林
小さな集落がある穏やかな森だったものの
侵食の度合が激しく、人々も集落を捨てて
逃げ出している。ピクシーたちが集まる小屋も
あったが、侵食に飲み込まれてしまった
column4:
Sealed forest in the northwest of Morrow Forest.
It was once a peaceful forest with a small
village, but the level of corruption grew severe,
causing the people to abandon the village and
escape.
There was also a cabin where the pixies gathered,
but it too was swallowed up by the corruption.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
モロー樹林北部に位置する封鎖された森林
グリフィンの飛来を理由に立ち入りを制限されていた
確認しに行った者はいないが、恐らくこの場にいた
グリフィンも侵食されてしまったものと思われる
column4:
<COL ffdc78>Jewelry Door</COL>
A sealed forest located in the northern part of
Morrow Forest.
Access was restricted due to the arrival of a
griffin.
No one has confirmed it, but it is likely that
the griffin present in this area has also been
corrupted.

column3: 支援品の配給
封鎖エリア《森民の地下道》開放
《グローン・ノス》に新たな強敵が出現
封鎖エリア《神花のテラス》開放
《エレメントアーチャ―》のジョブマスターに紹介
支援品ランクアップ
《サーズ・ディナン》に新たな強敵が出現
《エルネア・スプリング》に新たな強敵が出現
封鎖エリア《レ・カルバス・アーマ》開放
支援品ランクアップ
《ディナン深層林》各地にある未解放のリム転移 解放
《大樹の広場》に新たな強敵が出現
column4: New powerful enemy at "Big Tree Dell"

column3: 封鎖エリア《飛天のテラス》開放
《飛天のテラス》に新たな強敵が出現
支援品ランクアップ

レスタニア南部の広大な森林
多くの動植物、人、そして魔物が住み、それを可能
にするだけの恵みに満ちている。また、森のいたる
所に自然洞窟や旧時代の遺跡なども存在するため
探索には事欠かない地域である
column4:
A vast forest in southern Lestania.
Abundant with a wide variety of animals, plants,
people, and creatures, thanks to its bountiful
blessings. Moreover, the forest is adorned with
natural caves and ancient ruins scattered
throughout, making it an ideal region for
exploration.

column3:
ポーンの民が集い、新しき覚者との契約を待つ聖堂
聖堂はレスタニアと異界との接点を守るために
偉大な覚者が大昔建造したと伝えられている
現在は里長アルヴァーが管理者を務めており
《プリースト》の導き手カミュも滞在している
column4:
The holy temple where the pawns gather, awaiting
the contract with the newly awakened Arisen.
It is said that the temple was built by a great
Arisen in ancient times to protect the connection
between Lestania and the other realm.
Currently, it is managed by the village elder,
Alvar, and the Priest, Camus, also resides there.

column3:
ミスリウ森林中部にある、狩人と木こりの村
獣革や木材、薬草類など森は資源が豊富なため
素材を扱う者にとって重要な村である
ただし森には遺跡や自然洞窟も多く、そこをねぐら
とする魔物への警戒は常に必要だ
column4:
A village of Hunters and Woodcutters.
Located in the central part of the Mysree Forest,
this village is important for those who handle
materials such as animal hides, lumber, and
medicinal herbs, as the forest is abundant in
resources. However, the forest is also filled with
ruins and natural caves, which serve as lairs for
enemies, so caution is always necessary.

column3:
魔女エメラダが住む森林の家
彼女に教えを請うことで
《ソーサラー》として破壊の魔術の
深淵により近づくことができるだろう
column4:
The house in the forest where Witch Emerada
lives.
By seeking her guidance, one can come closer to
the abyss of destructive magic as a Sorcerer.

column3:
ポーン郷からリンウッド方面に繋がる
木造の橋。南ハイデル大橋と同時期の水害で
破損したが、住民の手が回らず復旧が遅れていた
放置された理由は、ポーン郷へ行く覚者の多くが
リム転移を用いるためらしい
column4:
A wooden bridge that connects from Pawn Cathedral
to Lynwood.
It was damaged during the same flood as the South
Hidell Bridge, but restoration was delayed as the
residents were unable to handle it.
The reason for its abandonment seems to be
because many Arisen who go to Pawn Cathedral use
Rift Teleport.

column3:
森林北部にあるフォレストゴブリンの集落
カボチャの栽培や狩猟だけではなく、ここには
人や家畜を襲って得た物品も集められている
特に長である《緑鬼グリッガ》とその手下達は
好んで人を襲うため、警戒しなければならない
column4:
Forest Goblin settlement in the northern part of
the forest.
In addition to pumpkin cultivation and hunting,
they also gather items stolen from people and
livestock.
In particular, Gurigga the Green Demon and his
minions, who are especially skilled, enjoy
attacking people, so we must be cautious.

column3:
祭祀場にはさまざまな魔物が出没するが、このほど
特に攻撃性の高いエントの出現が確認された
以前も起こったこの特異なエントの出現は
さらに大きな脅威に繋がる可能性がある
早急な討伐と監視が必要だ
column4:
Various monsters have been appearing in the
ritual hall, but recently, the emergence of an
especially aggressive Ent has been confirmed.
The recurring appearance of this peculiar Ent
could potentially lead to an even greater threat.
Swift subjugation and surveillance are necessary.

column3:
リンウッドほど近くにある地下水路
魔物が巣くい使われなくなって久しいが、以前は
この水路で河川の水位を調整し水害に備えていた
リンウッドが水路を閉鎖した後も魔物は増え、
時に凶暴な大猿が出没することもある
column4:
An underground waterway near Lynwood.
Although it has been abandoned by monsters for a
long time, in the past, this waterway was used to
adjust the water level of the river and prepare
for floods. Even after Lynwood closed the
waterway, the number of monsters increased, and
sometimes ferocious apes would haunt the area.

column3:
注意すべきドレッドエイプ、《唸り猿》が
縄張りにしている廃屋
廃屋の周囲は食い散らかされた動物の残骸が
散乱しており、恐ろしい上非常に臭い――
column4:
The Dread Ape, known as the "Howler Ape," has
taken over the abandoned house as its territory.
The surroundings of the abandoned house are
littered with the remains of devoured animals,
making it both terrifying and extremely
foul-smelling.

column3:
特に危険なドレッドエイプ、《裂き猿》が
巣くっている廃屋
廃屋の周囲は正体不明の死肉が散乱しており
不気味な様子を醸し出している
column4:
In the rundown building where the ferocious Dread
Ape, "Ripper Ape," resides, there are unidentified
pieces of dead flesh scattered around, creating an
eerie atmosphere.

column3:
とりわけ獰猛なドレッドエイプ、《豚喰い猿》が
ねぐらにしている廃屋
廃屋の周囲は攫われた家畜や野豚が
多数溜めこまれている
column4:
The abandoned house that the particularly
ferocious Dread Ape, "Pig-Eating Ape," has made
its lair.
Around the abandoned house, numerous abducted
livestock and wild boars are gathered.

column3:
ミスリウ森林の外れに位置する広大な鍾乳洞
そのあまりの深さと、そこをねぐらにする
凶悪な魔獅子の存在から立ち入り禁止になった
奥にはさまざまな魔物や資源があるだろう
column4:
Located on the outskirts of Mysree Forest is a
vast limestone cave.
Due to its incredible depth and the presence of a
demon lion that have made it their lair, access to
the cave has been prohibited.
There are likely various enemies and resources
deep within.

column3:
リンウッドからミスリウ森林深部へと向かう一本道の
中ほどにある、少し開けた場所。背の高い木々が多く
鬱蒼としている上に靄が出やすく、開けた印象の割に
視界が悪い。そのためか盗賊や魔物が潜みやすく
森を抜ける際の一番の難所と言われる
column4:
In the middle of the straight road leading from
Lynwood to Mysree Grove in the Mysree Forest,
there is a slightly open area. There are many tall
trees, and it is dense and foggy, despite the open
impression.
The visibility is poor, making it easy for
bandits and enemies to lurk.
It is said to be the most challenging place to
pass through the forest.

column3:
ポーンの民が渡る、この世ならざる空間
世界の淵辺にあたるとされ、普通の人間には足を
踏み入れるどころか、入口を見ることすらできない
“異界歩き”と呼ばれるポーンがなぜ覚者に応え
現れるのか、それを知るのは竜のみである
column4:
The space where the pawns traverse, a realm
unlike this world.
Believed to exist on the edge of the world,
beyond the reach of ordinary humans who can't even
step inside, let alone see the entrance.
Only the dragons know why the pawns, called
'striders of other worlds', answer to the Arisen.

column3:
ミスリウ森林南西の大洞窟
深部にある巨大空洞には、名の由来でもある
《燐光虫》という虫が棲息し、星空に迷い込んだかの
ような美しさであると言われる。しかし、鬼人や
エイプの住処ともなっており危険は大きい
column4:
Mysree Forest, located in the southwest, holds a
massive cave. Deep within this cave, there is a
breathtaking sight named after the "Glowworms"
that reside there. It is said to possess a beauty
reminiscent of getting lost in the starry sky.
However, it is also known to be a dangerous
dwelling for Demons and Apes.

column3:
森の南部に位置する小洞窟
内部にはそこそこ開けた空間があり
魔獣の類が巣にしているらしい
時おり、外にまで唸り声が聞こえるという
column4:
In the southern part of the forest, there is a
small cave.
Inside, there is a decently spacious area.
It seems that creatures of the magical kind have
made their nests there.
Occasionally, their growls can be heard from
outside.

column3:
普通の人間には入口を見ることすらできない
世界の淵辺にあたるとされる空間の深層部
この空間がどのようにして成り立ち、どこに
続いていくのか未だ知る者はいない
column4:
The entrance is not even visible to ordinary
people.
It is the deep part of a space considered to be
the edge of the world.
No one yet knows how this space is formed or
where it leads.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
ミスリウ森林から深部へ続く洞穴に埋もれていた古い
地下墓地。夜間、どこからともなく森に現れる不死者
達はこの墳墓から彷徨い出たものらしい。長く封じら
れていたため、あまり見ない魔物が潜む可能性が高い
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】Door</COL>
A hidden underground cemetery that was buried
deep within the caves leading from the Mysree
Forest. The undead that appear in the forest at
night seem to have emerged from this tomb. Since
it had been sealed for a long time, there is a
high possibility that unseen enemies lurk within.

平原と山岳地帯の中ほどに位置する大渓谷
渓流と針葉樹林の茂る美しい景観が最大の魅力
自然だけではなく、旧白騎団の古城、見張り塔
など遺構も数多く存在し、かつてここが繁栄の地で
あった事を偲ばせる
column4:
A large valley located in the middle of a plain
and mountainous region.
The most significant charm of this place lies in
its beautiful landscape with flowing streams and
lush coniferous forests. It's not only the natural
beauty but also the numerous remnants of the old
White Knights' castle, watchtowers, and other
structures that evoke memories of the past
prosperity of this area.

column3:
険しい渓谷にしがみつくように残された小村
かつて、ドリード城主が健在だった時代は賑わって
いたが、北部オーク軍の動きが活発化した頃から
強力な魔物の襲撃もあり、徐々に人が離れた
しかし、景観や古城に魅せられる探訪者は多い
column4:
Nestled in a treacherous ravine, a small village
remains clinging on.
Once thriving in the days when Lord Dreed ruled,
it gradually lost its inhabitants as the movements
of the Northern Orc army intensified.
Nevertheless, many visitors are still enchanted by
the scenery and the ancient Dreed Castle.

column3:
ひょうきんな軽業師、チェスターが住む家
登ることと身ごなしにかけては卓越した
技能を誇る彼に師事すれば、《シーカー》
としてより高みを目指すことができるだろう
column4:
The house where the playful acrobat, Chester,
lives.
If you study under him, who excels in climbing
and agility, you will be able to aim for greater
heights as a Seeker.

column3:
旧時代、ドリード城と周辺の警戒のため建てられた
監視塔。ダウが関所で封鎖される前は、騎士団詰め所
として前時代と同じく利用されていたが、侵入した
オーク軍との一戦により壊滅、再び廃墟と化した
現在は、死肉に集ったハーピーが占拠している
column4:
In the olden days, a surveillance tower was built
to guard Dreed Castle and its surroundings.
Before Dowe was sealed off at the checkpoint, it
was used as a knights' headquarters, just like in
the previous era.
However, it was destroyed and turned into ruins
again due to a battle with the invading Orc army.
Currently, it is occupied by Harpies gathering
dead flesh.

column3:
ダウ渓谷の滝近くにある浅瀬。ここはもともと
サルファーリザードの棲息地帯だが、とりわけ
大きく強力な個体が確認された。この個体
《タイガーテール・サルファー》については
特に注意する必要がある
column4:
There is a shallow area near the waterfall in
Dowe Valley.
This place was originally a habitat for Sulfur
Saurians, but particularly large and powerful
individuals have been confirmed. Special attention
is needed for one individual specifically, the
"Sulfur Tiger-Tail"

column3:
崖上にある自然洞窟
各種鉱石の採掘場として人の手が入った
時期もあるものの、過去に恐ろしい魔物
の住処となったことで封鎖されていた
column4:
On the cliff, there is a natural cave that has
been used by human hands as a mining site for
various ores.
It has been sealed off due to becoming a dwelling
place for terrifying creatures in the past.

column3:
ドリード城近くの地下墓地
城が白衛騎士団の本拠地であった頃、処罰された
罪人や獄死した者を葬っていた場所であり
今なお重く冷たい空気が漂っている
column4:
Near Dreed Castle is an underground cemetery.
It was a place where convicted criminals and
those who died in prison were buried when the
castle served as the headquarters of the White
Knight Order.
Even now, a heavy and chilling atmosphere lingers.

column3:
ダウ渓谷東部、最も標高の高い崖上に、石象の並ぶ
奇妙な空間がある。そこに、昔ジンゲンに甚大な
被害を出したスフィンクスが再び姿を現した
《妖歌のローレライ》と呼ばれるこのスフィンクスを
確認した際は、急ぎ手を打つ必要がある
column4:
In the eastern part of the Dowe Valley, on the
highest cliff, there is a strange space lined with
stone statues.
There, the sphinx that caused enormous damage to
Jingen in the past has reappeared.
This sphinx, known as the "Demon Songtress
Lorelei" must be dealt with urgently if it is
confirmed!

column3:
ダウ渓谷、カタコンベ付近の木立
逃げ惑う姿勢のまま石と化した人影が木陰に
多数紛れているのが発見され、ジンゲンの
村人を恐怖に陥れた
column4:
Numerous figures, frozen like statues in a
posture of fleeing, were discovered hidden among
the trees near the Catacombs in Dowe Valley. This
discovery plunged the villagers of Jingen into
fear.

column3:
廃墟の地下食糧庫。腐った食べ物を求めて
不死者がぞろぞろ入り込んだという噂があり
ジンゲンの民は気味悪がっている
column4:
A ruined underground supply store.
Rumors have circulated that undead creatures have
swarmed in, seeking rotten food.
The people of Jingen are feeling uneasy about it.

column3:
渓谷の一軒家の裏手にある井戸
まだ掘削中らしく、水源には届いて
いないようだ
column4:
There is a well in the backyard of the Lone House
in the Valley.
It seems that they are still in the process of
digging, and it appears that they have not yet
reached the water source.

column3:
ドリード城にほど近い廃墟の地下ワイン庫
かつては城に献上するワインが集められて
いたそうだが、現在は見る影もない
column4:
The underground wine cellar, located near Dreed
Castle, is now nothing more than a ruin.
It used to store wines that were once offered to
the castle, but now there is no sign of its former
glory.

column3:
廃墟傍にある古井戸
なぜ「閉ざされた」と呼ばれているかに
ついては詳しく知られていない
column4:
The old well near the ruins is called "closed,"
but the detailed reasons are not well known.

column3:
ドリード監視塔の地下、かつて白衛騎士団
の詰め所だった跡地
ハイデルに神殿が築かれてからもダウを守る
要所だったが、二十年以上前オークに攻められ
無人になった。今も騎士の骸が彷徨っている
column4:
Underground of the Dreed Watchtower, the site of
the former Headquarters of the White Knight Order.
It was a key point protecting Dowe even after the
temple was built in Heidell, but it was attacked
by orcs over 20 years ago and
left uninhabited.
The remains of the knights still wander around.

column3:
ダウ渓谷、一軒家に近い崖際にある坑道
中には鉱員のなれの果てや野盗、小鬼
などが住みついている
ところどころ、爆薬があれば破壊できる
岩壁が存在する
column4:
In the Dowe Valley, there is a tunnel located
near the cliff, close to a house.
Inside, miners, bandits, and small demons, among
others, have taken up residence.
There are occasional rock walls that can be
destroyed with explosives.

column3:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
渓谷深くにひっそりとたたずんでいるが
風景と相まって廃墟化した今も美しさが残る
column4:
In the olden days, this was one of the altars of
the White Dragon, which was celebrated in various
places.
It stands quietly, deep in the valley, but even
now, amidst its ruins, it retains its beauty,
blending with the landscape.

column3:
ダウ渓谷にそびえ立つ古城廃墟
３００年前は騎士団長が城主を務めレスタニアの
守りを担っていたが、白竜が墜ちた後に捨てられ
今に至る。内部には住みついた魔物だけでなく
旧時代の遺物も多く残されているらしい
column4:
Standing tall in the Dowe Valley is the ancient
castle ruin.
300 years ago, it was the stronghold of the
knight commander who protected Lestania.
However, it was abandoned after the fall of the
White Dragon, and it remains deserted to this day.
Inside, not only are there lurking demons, but
also numerous relics from the past era are said to
be preserved.

column3:
ダウ平原中央に存在する水路跡
内部には川の水が流れ込んでおり、同時に周囲
に生息するサルファーリザードも多数
入りこんでいる
column4:
Located in the central part of the Dowe Plains,
there is a trace of a water channel.
Inside, the water from the river flows in, and at
the same time, there are also many Sulfur Saurians
living in the surrounding area.

column3:
かつて、ドリード城主がドリード監視塔と城を
繋ぐために作ったと言われる地下道
そのため入口の一つは塔の近くに、もう一つは
城のどこかと繋がっているらしい
罪人の墓地としても利用されたようだ
column4:
It is said that the underground passage was once
created by the Lord of Dreed Castle to connect the
Dreed Watchtower and the castle.
As a result, one entrance is said to be near the
tower, and the other one is apparently connected
somewhere in the castle.
It appears that it was also used as a graveyard
for criminals.

column3:
かつてドリード城からハイデルへの物資搬入
などに使われていた地下通路
ドリード城が捨てられると同時に封鎖され
現在は朽ちた物資もそのままになっている
column4:
Once used for the transportation of goods from
Dreed Castle to Heidell, an underground passage
now lies sealed since the abandonment of the
castle, leaving the decaying supplies untouched.

column3:
ドリード城内、《地下通用口》から繋がる水路
もとはドリード城と河川の運搬路を繋ぐ連絡路
であったようだが、城の牢で獄死した者の骨や
入りこんだ魔物、瘴気が溜まり本来の機能は
失われて久しい
column4:
An underground waterway connected to the
"Underground Side Entrance" within Dreed Castle.
Originally, it served as a passage linking the
castle and the river for transportation purposes.
However, it has long lost its original function
due to the accumulation of bones of those who died
in the castle's prison, as well as the presence of
invading monsters and miasma.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【宝飾】の扉あり</COL>
ダウ渓谷の北にある関所のすぐ裏手にある井戸
何年も前に井戸としての機能を失い、不便な場所に
あったこともあって、修理もされずに放置されていた
いつしかその存在すら忘れられていた
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Jewelry】 Door</COL>
There is a well located just behind the
Checkpoint to the north of Dowe Valley.
It lost its function as a well many years ago and
was left unattended due to its inconvenient
location.
Its existence had been forgotten over time.

column3: 支援品ランクアップ

北東部には、アッカーシェラン王国にとっての要衝
である《展望城》が存在する。通常、王族が居留
することはなく、兵士たちによる防衛拠点として機能
していた。水脈が豊富である一方で水はけの悪い地質
であり、ぬかるみや滝が多いため足元には注意が必要
column4:
In the northeastern region, there is a critical
stronghold for the Kingdom of Acre Selund, called
"Lookout Castle."
It usually functions as a defensive base for the
soldiers and is not typically inhabited by the
royal family.
The area has abundant water veins, but due to its
poor drainage, there are many muddy areas and
waterfalls, requiring caution when walking.

column3:
戦禍を逃れてきた人たちが、森の中で
息を潜めるように、しかししたたかに支え合って
暮らしている非常に小さな集落
避難民の中に統率力に優れる者がいるらしく
今のところ比較的安定した生活を送っている
column4:
A very small settlement where people who have
escaped from the ravages of war live hidden in the
forest.
They support each other cunningly yet quietly,
living together.
Among the refugees, there seems to be someone
with exceptional leadership skills, and they are
currently leading a relatively stable life.

column3:
かつては蛮族の地と呼ばれた南部地方に睨みを
きかせる要衝として建造された
アッカーシェラン大陸ではメガド離宮、王都メガドに
次いで古い建造物。城主はアッカー家の当主だが
実質的な管理者である“城番”は兵士が就くことが
できる最高位とされている
column4:
In the southern region, which was once called the
land of barbarians, a strategic point was built to
intimidate the surrounding area.
It is the third oldest structure in the Acre
Selund continent, following the Megado Detached
Palace and the Royal Capital Megado.
While the lord of the Acre family is the castle
owner, the "Castle Sentinel", who is the actual
administrator, is considered the highest position
that soldiers can hold.

column3:
河の流れによって様々なものが漂着する河岸
上流から流されてきたものの中には、解放軍の戦士
たちだけでなく魔軍の獣の死骸も多数存在する
流れ着いた骸から出でたものか、死臭に惹かれて
きたものか、骨になっても徘徊する魔物が徘徊する
column4:
By the flow of the river, various things drift
and accumulate on the riverbank.
Among the things carried downstream, there are
not only soldiers of the Liberation Army, but also
many carcasses of the enemy's animals.
Whether they emerged from the washed-up corpses
or were attracted by the stench of death,
wandering monsters continue to wander even in
their skeletal forms.

column3:
丘の上を縄張りとするゴブリン族の住処
一際凶暴なグレーターゴブリン《小鬼殺しのオジナ》
がリーダーとなっている。オジナは仲間をも攻撃
する残虐さで群れを支配しており、手下たちは
恐怖からか異常なまでの興奮状態にある
column4:
Goblin territory on top of the hill.
Led by the exceptionally vicious Greater Goblin,
Ogina, known as the "Kobold Killer".
Ogina dominates the pack with his cruelness,
attacking even his own allies, and his
subordinates are in an abnormally excited state,
perhaps out of fear.

column3:
魔軍が進軍する際に通過する中継地
ここで一旦の補給や、オークたちが使役する
魔物の装甲を手入れしてから目的地へ出発
しているとの情報が寄せられている
column4:
Intermediate point through which the demon army
passes when advancing.
It has been reported that they temporarily
replenish supplies here and Orcs maintain their
armor before departing for their destination.

column3:
アッカーシェラン大陸の西域に広がる大湿地帯
その広さ故に、古来から戦場になることが多い
傷を負って死を待つばかりの兵たちの嘆きが
絶えることがなかったと伝えられている
column4:
The vast swamp spreads to the western region of
Acre Selund Continent.
Due to its size, it has often been a battlefield
since ancient times.
It is said that the lament of soldiers who were
only waiting for death while wounded never ceased.

column3:
フェルヤナ地方の外れにある門。そこを抜けると
魔軍の拠点に繋がるらしく、魔軍側も警戒を
強める最近では大門の前にまで野営地が拡がり
見張りの魔物が日夜目を光らせている
column4:
Gate located at the outskirts of Feryana region.
It seems to connect to the demon army's base, and
recently, the demon army has been increasing their
vigilance.
The encampment has expanded all the way to the
front of the main gate, and the guarding monsters
keep their eyes shining day and night.

column3:
年老いた奇面獣《ブルータルハーミット》の住処
人々の間ではその恐ろしさが代々語り継がれる
ほどであり、周囲に近寄ろうとする者はまずいない
しかし、魔軍はこの強力な奇面獣をなんとか利用
しようと捕獲を目論んでいるようだ
column4:
The lair of the aged beast, Brutal Hermit.
Its terror has been passed down through
generations, so much so that few dare to approach
it.
However, the Demon Army seems intent on capturing
and somehow harnessing the power of this
formidable creature.

column3:
森を抜けて展望城へと向かう兵士たちが
ことごとくこの周辺にて魔物の襲撃を受けている
どうやら人間を待ち伏せするに格好の場所
として魔軍に認識されているようだ
column4:
Soldiers heading towards Lookout Castle after
passing through the forest have all been attacked
by monsters in this area.
It seems that this place has been recognized by
the Demon Army as a perfect location to ambush
humans.

column3:
展望城の目前に広がる湿地帯全域を監視
している魔軍拠点。監視対象としている範囲が
広いため、魔軍に使役されるナイトメアが空からも
目を光らせる。要衝である展望城に近いせいか
数多くの兵器が配備されていることがわかっている
column4:
This is a base for the Demon Army that monitors
the entire marshy area that stretches in front of
the observatory castle. Because the area being
monitored is wide, nightmares are used by the
Demon Army keep an eye on it from the sky. It is
known that a large number of weapons are deployed
in the area due to its proximity to the Lookout
Castle, which is a key
point.

column3:
王家の次期当主がその力を示すために
代々使われてきた地下道。内部には強力な
守護者が配置されているとみられるが、これまで
王家の者以外が足を踏み入れられることは
無かったため、情報に乏しい
column4:
The underground passage that has been used by the
next head of the royal family to demonstrate his
power.
It is believed that powerful guardians are placed
inside, but there is little information as no one
other than the royal family has ever set foot in
there.

column3:
《森の隠れ村》にほど近い古い祠
アッカーシェランの大地に満ちた炎の気が滞留し
内部に足を踏み入れるとじっとりとした熱さを感じる
悪意を秘めたままに落命した者は、その悪意
を忘れ去るまで魂を焼かれながら祠を徘徊するという
column4:
An old shrine near the "Forest's Hidden Village".
It is filled with the lingering flame in the land
of Acre Selund.
Once you step inside, you can feel the damp heat.
It is said that those who died with malice in
their hearts will roam the shrine, their souls
burning until they forget their malice.

column3:
王族のみが知りえた隠れ道
有事の際は隠れ家としても使えるよう工夫されて
おり、最低限の施設は整っている
王家の統治が行き届くようになってからは
使われることもなくなり、忘れ去られていた
column4:
The hidden passage that only the royal family
knew about was designed to also serve as a hiding
place in times of emergency.
It had the minimum necessary facilities.
Since the governance of the royal family became
more meticulous, it was no longer used and
forgotten.

column3:
遺跡をそのまま活用した魔軍の拠点
しばらく出入りが途絶えた後も本拠点から
魔軍が進行するなどの様子から、一時的な
滞在ではなく、この場で一通りの生活が
できるように設計されているものと思われる
column4:
The demon army's base, which has been constructed
by utilizing ruins as is.
From the fact that the demon army continues to
advance even after there has been no activity for
a while, it is believed that this base is designed
for not just temporary stays, but for living a
complete life here after all.

column3:
古くより放棄されたままとなっていた地下水道
既に水はほぼ枯れたものと思われていたが
何者かが侵入した形跡が発見され、調査される
こととなった。内部にはおびただしいほどの不死者や
思念体がはびこっているが、発生の原因は不明
column4:
Long abandoned, the underground sewage system was
thought to have already dried up.
However, evidence of someone's intrusion was
discovered and further investigation was
initiated.
Inside, an overwhelming number of undead beings
were rampant, but the cause of their emergence
remains unknown.

column3:
アッカーシェラン王家に連なる者、または王家の
ためにその力を尽くした英雄たちが眠る遺跡
英霊は王家に危機が迫る時あらば再び
呼び声に応じ、その力を貸すといわれる
column4:
The royal descendants of the Acre Selund family,
or the heroes who exerted their power for the sake
of the royal family, rest in this shrine.
When the royal family is in imminent danger, it
is said that the heroic spirits respond to the
call and lend their power.

column3:
この大陸にアッカー王家が誕生する遥か昔から
大地を蝕む強大な魔物が棲息していた――という
話は、アッカーシェランの国民ならば一度は
聞いたことがある昔話である。物語の結末は
「魔物は王によって地下深く封印された」となる
column4:
Since ancient times, there has been a tale that
tells of powerful monsters residing in this land,
where the Acre royal family was born.
If you are a citizen of Acre Selund, you have
surely heard this story once before.
The conclusion of the tale is that "the monsters
were sealed deep underground by the king."

column3:
フェルヤナ荒原南部、多数のオークが出入りする洞窟
自然の洞窟を利用した拠点のように偽装しているが
内部が強力な兵器を集めた武器庫として使われている
ことは、時折洞窟の奥から響く轟音から明らかである
column4:
In the southern area of the Feryana Wilderness,
there is a cave where numerous orcs come and go.
It is disguised as a natural cave, but it is
evident from the occasional roar that echoes from
the depths of the cave that it is actually being
used as an arsenal gathering powerful weapons.

column3: 亡都メルゴダ
メルゴダ居住区
テオドール錬金工房
封じの玄室
錬金研究室
さる錬金術師の家
エリクシル精製室
宮殿前広場
メルゴダ民の住居
メルガン・アルケミデア
亡都メルゴダ　下層
亡都メルゴダ　王宮層
秘匿の実験場

ミスリウ森林奥地の湿地林
イニアス湖を中心としたこの森は、リンウッド周辺
とはまた別の表情を見せる。湖の周囲には神秘的
な遺跡が点在し、ここが人とは異なる者の生活圏で
あったことを今に伝えている
column4:
The Mysree Forest, located deep in the wetland
forest,
presents a different facade from the surroundings
of Lynwood.
Mysterious ruins are scattered around the lake,
telling us that this place was once a habitat for
beings different from humans.

column3:
旧時代、各地に祭られた白竜の祭壇の一つ
ミスリウ森林深部を見守る管理者がおり
森深くを訪れる者にとっては大切な
憩いの場所である
column4:
In the old days, there was a shrine of the White
Dragon that was celebrated in various places.
In the deep part of Mysree Forest, there is a
guardian who watches over it, and it is an
important place for visitors who delve into the
depths of the forest to find solace and
relaxation.

column3:
凄腕のマタギ、イヴァンが住む山小屋
彼の腕は《ハンター》としてレスタニア随一
であると、知る人ぞ知る有名人
だが気難しい性格のためか、戦技を教えて
もらえる者はまれらしい
column4:
Ivan, a skilled hunter, resides in a mountain
cabin.
His prowess as a Hunter is renowned throughout
Lestania.
However, due to his difficult personality, it is
rare for anyone to receive instruction in his
combat techniques.

column3:
森林奥地へ続く山道の崩落が除かれた
これで、さらに深い樹林に踏み入ることも可能に
なった。奥地は秘境のため、十分準備をして
向かうべきだろう
column4:
The collapsed mountain path that leads to the
depths of the forest has been cleared away.
With this, it is now possible to venture further
into the dense woods.
As the interior is an uncharted territory, it
would be advisable to make thorough preparations
before heading there.

column3:
森林深部、イニアス湖の北岸に密猟者がキャンプを
構えている。たちの悪いことに、密猟者が獲物とする
のは獣だけではなく、狩人や旅人も含むという
不意の狙撃に合わぬよう、十分な警戒が必要だ
column4:
In the deep part of the forest, poachers have set
up a camp on the north shore of Lake Inias.
Unfortunately, the poachers target not only
animals as their prey, but also hunters and
travelers.
To avoid unexpected sniper attacks, it is
necessary to be vigilant and cautious.

column3:
イニアス湖西側、浅瀬と草地の混じったこの場所は
ブルーニュートが多く出没する。その中で、近年
強力な電撃を纏った変異種が現れるようになった
これら《コバルトニュート》と遭遇した場合
討伐が推奨されている
column4:
On the western side of Lake Inias, in this area
mixed with shallow waters and meadows, there are
many Blue Newts.
Among them, in recent years, a mutated species
that is enveloped in powerful electric shocks has
started to appear.
In case of an encounter with these "Cobalt
Newts," it is recommended to subdue them.

column3:
住居跡らしき神秘的な遺跡
廃墟と化してなお、緑生い茂るたたずまいは
壮麗さを残している。内部には不思議な装置が
あり、奥に進むには仕組みの理解を要する
column4:
Mysterious ruins that resembles a place of
residence.
Even in its state of being in ruins, it retains
its splendid beauty, with lush greenery
surrounding it.
Inside, there are peculiar devices, and
understanding their mechanism is necessary to
proceed further.

column3:
霊泉のテラス深部に純白の獅子が現れた
その姿は大理石のように淡く輝き、瞳と口は血と
魔力で赤く濡れているという。フォレストゴブリン
が聖獣として崇めるこの白獅子が村に出てゆく前に
何とか対処しなければならない
column4:
A pure white lion appeared in the depths of the
Sacred Spring Terrace.
Its figure was pale and radiant like marble, and
its eyes and mouth were said to be wet with blood
and magic, creating a red hue.
This white lion, revered by the Forest Goblins as
a sacred beast, must be dealt with before it
leaves for the village.

column3:
いつ存在し、いつ滅びたかも不明な廃村。村の
跡地は緑に覆われ、今や完全に人の気配はない
だが、付近で人のすすり泣きのような声を聞いた、
怪しい人影を見た、といった噂が狩人の間で
囁かれているらしい
column4:
A deserted village whose existence and demise are
uncertain.
The site of the village is now covered in
greenery, and there is no trace of human presence
whatsoever.
However, there are rumors circulating among
hunters that they have heard voices resembling a
person crying and have seen suspicious figures
nearby.

column3:
森の南、ディナン山道への途中にトロールの寝所
がある。かつて覚者に撃退されしばらく姿を見せな
かった巨人ヨトンがどうやら戻ってきたらしい
人を憎み襲うこの巨人は非常に危険なため
近くを通る時は最大限の警戒が必要だ
column4:
On the way to the Dinnan Mountain Road in the
southern forest, there is a troll's resting place.
The giant Jotun, who was once repelled by an
Arisen and had not been seen for a while, seems to
have returned.
This giant, who hates humans and attacks them on
sight, is extremely dangerous, so maximum caution
is necessary when passing by.

column3:
イニアス湖南側、《霧幻のテラス》付近にて
霞んだような人影に声をかけられたという噂が
続出するようになった。声に応じようとしても
返答が返ってくることはなく、その不気味さ故に
近くを通る者はさらに減少したという
column4:
At Lake Inias on the southern side, near the
Misty Illusion Terrace, rumors have been spreading
that people have been approached by a figure that
seems to be shrouded in mist.
Despite trying to respond to the voice, there is
no reply, which has only increased the eerieiness
and caused even fewer people to pass by.

column3:
緑に侵食された廃墟の地下倉庫
密猟者が、食糧の貯蔵や寝食に潜むことが
ある。近くには彼らのキャンプもあるため
可能であれば近づかないほうがよい
column4:
Underground storehouse in the ruins, overrun by
greenery.
Poachers may hide here for food storage and rest.
There is also their camp nearby, so it's best to
avoid approaching if possible.

column3:
ミスリウ森林深部、西側にある古い遺跡
内部もまた緑で覆われ、野獣や森小人が
現在の主となっている
column4:
In the deep part of Mysree Forest, there is an
ancient ruin on the west side.
Its interior is also covered in greenery, and
animals and forest spirits have become its current
inhabitants.

column3:
ミスリウ森林深部、南端にある遺跡
特に様々な森の獣が集まる場所であるが、
その理由は遺跡内に存在する霊泉の活力
によるものであるそうだ。また、その奥は
恐るべき白獅子の住処であったという
column4:
In the deep depths of Mysree Forest, located at
the southern end, there is an ancient ruin.
It is particularly known as a gathering place for
various forest creatures.
The reason for this is said to be the vitality of
the sacred spring that exists within the ruins.
Furthermore, it is said that deep inside, there
was the dwelling of a fearsome white lion.

column3:
<COL ffdc78>【昌石】の扉あり</COL>
ミスリウ深部、イニアス湖の南で新たに発見
された森民の遺跡。湖からくる湿気のせいか
白く靄がかかっている。靄は遺跡の外にまで
漏れ出し、全ての輪郭を朧にしている
column4:
<COL ffdc78>【Gemstone】Door</COL>
A newly discovered forest tribal ruin in the
depths of Mysree, located south of Lake Inias.
Perhaps due to the moisture from the lake, a
white mist hangs in the air, obscuring the
outlines of everything, even leaking beyond the
boundaries of the ruin.
